title: Experienced Video Editor (Cinematic Storytelling & Social Media Content)
description:
Overview



I run a story-driven Sims 4 YouTube channel focused on cinematic romantic storytelling. I am looking for an experienced video editor to join the team to create videos for my social media accounts.



This role will start with a focus on short-form social media videos, but I am specifically looking for someone who is a strong editor overall. This is a good fit for someone who understands that romance, emotion, and pacing matter — and who enjoys working on story-driven content. This is intended to be a long-term, ongoing role for the right candidate.



What You’ll Be Doing:



- Edit short-form vertical videos for platforms like YouTube Shorts and Instagram Reels



- Choose strong 
nts and cut them into clear, engaging clips



- Pay attention to timing, pacing, and emotional beats



- Make sure audio is clear and visuals are smooth and stable



- Edit with an understanding of how short clips support longer story episodes



- Work with an awareness of social media trends and what performs well on short-form platforms



- Communicate clearly about progress, questions, and deadlines





This Role Is a Good Fit If You:



- Are a confident video editor with solid editing experience



- Have worked with social media, creators, or influencer content



- Understand what makes a short video work on social platforms



- Enjoy romantic, character-driven, or story-based content



- Can work independently once expectations are clear



- Review your work carefully before submitting



- Communicate professionally and reliably



- Experience with social media management is a plus



- Are familiar with The Sims 4 or similar gameplay-based content, or are willing and interested in learning and researching the niche in order to tailor your content to my needs





Technical Requirements:



- Experience using professional editing software (Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar)



- Comfortable editing vertical video formats from footage made for long-form formats



- Able to work with dialogue-heavy or story-focused footage



- Organized with files and deadlines





Hours & Pay:



- Part-time position starting at 8 hours per week



- Focus on short-form video editing for social media



- Pay is between $7-$9/hour based on experience (please include your rate expectations)





How to Apply:



To apply, please e-mail your application to 
 with the following subject line: Your Name -  Social Media Video Editor - M5



Please include the following with your application:



- A short description of your video editing experience



- A portfolio of your video editing work



- Please share your best examples of video editing (Both long-form and short-form examples are welcome)



- This role focuses on short-form, but overall editing skill is important



- A brief answer (1–2 sentences): What do you enjoy about editing romantic or story-driven content?



- Your availability to interview within the next three days



Applications submitted without a portfolio will not be considered.



Final Note



I’m looking for an editor who takes storytelling seriously, has a genuine interest in romantic storytelling, pays attention to detail, and communicates clearly. If you enjoy editing emotional, character-focused content and want to grow with a channel over time, I’d love to hear from you.

title: Product Lister Fashion Dropship ( Shopify )
description:
Hi,



We are looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Product Lister to join our e-commerce team. In this role, you will be responsible for accurately listing fashion products, managing collections, and ensuring all content aligns with our brand and target audience.



Apply with the word ''Strawberry''



Responsibilities

- Create and upload product listings efficiently and accurately

- Edit and optimize product photos using AI tools

- Add products to the correct collections and understand how collections are structured

- Ensure product listings are tailored to the target audience

- Maintain consistency and quality across all listings



Requirements

- Flexible, fast, and results-driven

- Highly detail-oriented and used to reviewing work carefully

- Strong understanding of how to communicate with a fashion-focused target audience

- Eager to learn and improve skills over time

- Reliable and trustworthy — able to work independently and deliver quality work

- Available throughout the day for ongoing tasks and communication

- Understanding of how fashion collections work and how products are added to collections



Able to provide a portfolio with examples of fashion stores or fashion brands you have worked with



What We Offer

- Ongoing work with consistent tasks

- Clear processes and expectations

- Opportunity to grow with the brand



If you are organized, proactive, and have experience working with fashion e-commerce stores, we’d love to hear from you. Please include your portfolio or examples of relevant fashion work when applying.



Kind regards,

Alex

title: Accountant
description:
GMC Consulting Group is seeking a skilled and experienced Accountant to join our remote team. As an Accountant, you will play a crucial role in maintaining the financial health and accuracy of our records. Position is an opportunity to contribute to the overall success of our growing organization and advancing your professional skills.



GMC Consulting Group is a small accounting firm located in the heart of Silicon Valley on the West Coast in the United States . We have established a reputation for delivering exceptional results for our clients. Our team of highly skilled professionals is dedicated to driving innovation and helping our clients achieve their business objectives. The work is exciting and challenging due to the variety of clients and working with scaling companies.



This is a night shift only position working as an independent contractor. Candidates must be able to commit exclusively to this position and not engage in part-time or freelance work once hired.



What you'll be doing:

Supporting accounts payable, accounts receivable and ad hoc projects

Performing accounting tasks such as account reconciliations, journal entries, and month-end closings

Preparing and analyzing financial statements, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow reports

Maintaining accurate financial records and ensuring compliance with accounting standards and regulations

Problem-solving: identifying issues, analyzing them, and developing effective solutions

Identifying and implementing process improvements to enhance efficiency and accuracy

Providing support and guidance to team as needed

title: Senior Accountant
description:
Remote Full-time Senior Accountant needed for a small accounting firm located in the U.S. where we service startups and other small businesses. We provide Accounting, Human Resource and Payroll services to clients based in the U.S. a few have foreign subsidiaries. Most of our clients use QuickBooks online and NetSuite. The work is exciting and challenging due to the variety of clients and working with scaling companies that partner with us to help them achieve their goals . 



This is a night shift only position working as an independent contractor role. Candidates must be able to commit exclusively to this position and not engage in part-time or freelance work once hired.



Position requires a minimum of 7 years progressive experience closing the books and working in a remote team environment supporting multiple clients . You will support the overall objective of providing timely and accurate financial results, by performing critical tasks needed for the monthly close. You will be responsible for assisting in developing processes and procedures to ensure all general ledger activity is maintained in accordance with US Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP). You will also be involved in supporting Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable and ad hoc projects to support our growing business.



Required Skills:

Communication: Ability to clearly and effectively communicate internally & externally.

Accounting software proficiency: Familiarity with QBO & 
.

Problem-solving: The ability to identify issues, analyze them, and develop effective solutions.

title: Data Entry
description:
We are seeking an employee to help with our daily bookkeeping. We are a high volume e-commerce business therefore we will need our employee active daily on weekdays. You will be responsible for data entry transposing of cost of goods into sales and calculating out the profit each shift. This is time sensitive data which we will double checked daily by our on site manager. Accurate bookkeeping and double checking your work to ensure mistake-free data entry is highly important. Pay raise possible with effective work presence and time with the company. Pay starts at $1.50/hour set for the first month, there is a raise to $2/hour the second month when you will have additional tasks and opportunities for raises each month.. We will require active mouse use for the duration of your shift to ensure maximum time efficiency. We have set SOP's for exactly the expected work. Punctuality is a priority for our company.



--Please verify your identity on your account before applying. Applicants with unverified account information will not be responded to.

title: Social Media Assistant *Superstar Only*
description:
Job Title: Social Media Assistant (YouTube Focus)



About the Role

A Social Media Assistant supports 11LUX’s YouTube content operations by handling daily posting, basic content creation, optimization, analytics tracking, and community management. This role focuses on execution, consistency, and performance support to help drive views, engagement, and subscriber growth.



You help ensure content is published on time, optimized correctly, and supported by data-driven insights.



Job Responsibilities

As a Social Media Assistant, you will support daily YouTube operations and content growth.

More specifically, you’ll get to:

• Content Posting & Creation

Post 3 YouTube Shorts per day (content provided). After training, edit and publish 1 video per day using provided assets. Create weekly community posts. Posting may increase during launch weeks.

• Research & Optimization

Research YouTube updates, short-form trends, and editing styles. Optimize titles, captions, tags, descriptions, and metadata. Refine and proofread AI-generated captions and titles.

• Growth & Strategy Support

Assist with strategies to improve views, engagement, and subscribers. Identify underperforming content and suggest optimizations.

• Analytics & Reporting

Perform weekly performance reviews and assist with monthly end-of-month (EOM) reports. Track uploads and performance data consistently.

• Community Management & Compliance

Respond to comments daily. Monitor content for copyright issues, platform compliance, and errors.



Job Qualifications

• Experience managing or assisting with YouTube or social media accounts

• Basic understanding of YouTube optimization and short-form content

• Strong attention to detail and ability to follow instructions

• Willingness to learn, adapt, and stay updated on platform trends

• Ability to work independently and meet daily posting requirements



Results (What Success Looks Like)

A successful Social Media Assistant will deliver:

• Consistent daily posting and content output

• Properly optimized uploads

• Organized tracking of content and performance

• Improved engagement and steady channel growth support



Requirements for Effective Remote Work

• Reliable computer or laptop capable of photo and video editing

• Stable high-speed internet connection

• Conducive work environment



Working Schedule

• Full-time opportunity

• Remote work setup (Philippines-based applicants only)

• Preferred availability starting 7:00 AM EST onwards



Benefits

• Competitive pay

• Training and growth opportunities

• Opportunity to work with a fast-growing content-driven company



Application Instructions

Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here is what to do next:



Please click the link below, review the questions carefully, and share the required information.






If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: Bookkeeper and Financial Manager (Insight-Oriented)
description:
Part-Time | 5–10 hrs/week to start | Remote



PST Overlap Preferred (1–3 hrs/day)



$4–6 USD/hour (DOE)



Open to candidates based in the Philippines



---



About Wild Woman Herbal Apothecary



Wild Woman Herbal Apothecary is a California-based herbal wellness brand rooted in nature, ritual, and feminine wisdom.



We handcraft teas, tinctures, and herbal rituals that support women through life’s transitions — from fertility to postpartum to emotional and nervous system support.



Our mission is to make everyday healing simple, beautiful, and sustainable for our customers and for the woman building the business.



We are entering a season of stabilization and growth and are looking for reliable financial support to help us move from reactive money management into clarity, structure, and profitability.



---



About the Role



This role combines accurate bookkeeping with clear financial insight.



We are looking for a Bookkeeper / Financial Manager who not only keeps clean, accurate records, but can also interpret the numbers, flag concerns early, and offer practical recommendations to support better business decisions.



This is a calm, steady financial stewardship role designed to reduce stress and improve clarity for the Founder.



---



What You’ll Do



Bookkeeping & Accuracy



- Maintain accurate financial records using QuickBooks

- Record and categorize income, expenses, and payroll

- Reconcile bank and credit card accounts monthly

- Manage accounts payable and receivable

- Ensure books are clean, organized, and up to date



Financial Reporting & Clarity



- Prepare monthly:

    - Profit & Loss statements

    - Cash flow summaries

    - Expense breakdowns

- Explain reports in clear, simple language

- Highlight trends, inconsistencies, or concerns



Financial Insights & Recommendations



- Provide practical suggestions, such as:

    - Identifying unprofitable products or high-cost areas

    - Flagging labor or production inefficiencies

    - Supporting pricing or cost decisions

    - Assessing affordability of new hires or tools

- Help the Founder understand:

    - What’s sustainable right now

    - What should pause

    - What can grow safely



Cash Flow Support



- Monitor cash flow and monthly runway

- Flag risks before they become emergencies

- Support simple budgeting and forecasting



---



Who You Are



You are:



- Detail-oriented and highly accurate

- Calm, professional, and reliable

- Clear and concise in communication

- Comfortable offering suggestions respectfully

- Able to work independently with minimal supervision



You are not:



- Overly theoretical

- Emotionally demanding

- Creating unnecessary reports

- Requiring frequent meetings or micromanagement



---



Skills & Experience



- 2–5+ years of bookkeeping or financial management experience

- Strong proficiency in QuickBooks (or similar tools)

- Experience working with small businesses preferred

- Ability to explain numbers clearly and simply

- Comfortable working remotely and asynchronously

- Familiar with Google Workspace (Sheets, Drive, Docs)



Bonus (not required):



- Experience with e-commerce or product-based businesses

- Experience supporting founders directly

- Familiarity with U.S.-based businesses (tax handling not required)



---



What Success Looks Like



After 60–90 days:



• Books are accurate, current, and organized



• Monthly reports are clear and easy to understand



• Financial risks are flagged early



• The Founder feels calmer and more informed about money



• Decision-making feels less reactive



---



Hours & Compensation



- Hours: 5–10 hours/week to start

- Rate: $6–10 USD/hour (DOE)

- Meetings: Optional short monthly check-in or Loom update

- Growth: Opportunity to expand hours and responsibility over time



---



How to Apply



Please include:



1. A short introduction and why this role fits your experience

2. Your bookkeeping experience (years + tools used)

3. Example of how you’ve helped a business understand their numbers



Subject line: Bookkeeper – [Your Name]

title: Senior AI Visual Artist (The Creative Stager)
description:
Salary: PHP 65,000 – 75,000 / month + Bonuses (after 3 months)



Fixed day-shift Schedule: 10:00 AM – 7:00 PM PHT. Enjoy a perfect work-life balance while working for a premium US-based agency.



About us: We are building a specialized, elite team where everyone is treated as a partner, not just a number. We pay 2x to 3x above market rates because we expect 2x to 3x the attention to detail. We value your growth, your family time (no graveyard shifts), and we offer a long-term home for the best talent in the Philippines.



Role Overview:

You transform empty spaces into designer-level homes for US millionaires. We don't use slow 3D renders; we use high-speed AI workflows. You must have a "luxury eye" for interior design and architectural composition.



Core Responsibilities:

• AI Staging: Use AI tools (Collov, ReimagineHome) to stage luxury interiors.

• Prompt & Style Library: You will build and manage our Internal Prompt Library. Document the exact prompts for styles like Minimalist, Modern Organic, Coastal, and Hamptons to ensure brand consistency.

• Asset Curation: Maintain a library of approved AI furniture references and luxury decor styles.



Technical & Infrastructure Requirements:

• Proven portfolio in Luxury Virtual Staging or Interior Design.

• Expert in AI prompting for architecture.

• High-end workstation (32GB RAM min.) and reliable fiber internet with backup.

• Reliability: 100% uptime is required. You must have a primary fiber connection AND a proven backup internet source (Starlink, secondary ISP, or high-speed 5G).

• Power Backup: A laptop with a healthy battery or a UPS/Power Station for your desktop is mandatory to survive power outages.



General Terms & Elite Benefits 

• 13th Month Pay: Accrued monthly, paid annually.

• Fixed Schedule: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM PHT. No graveyard shifts.

• Strict No-Leave Policy: During the first 3 months of training, SOP development, and asset building, no leaves (planned or unplanned) are permitted to ensure full immersion.



Bonus Structure:

• Months 1-3 (Probation): Base Salary + Training. No personal bonuses during this phase.

• Month 4+: Eligibility for Monthly Personal Performance Bonuses (based on Scorecard).

• Quarterly: Eligibility for Team Revenue Bonuses (Starts after first full quarter).

• Infrastructure Bonus: We pay for elite talent; in return, we expect you to invest in your own redundant power and internet setups to guarantee 100?livery.



Career Growth & Future Opportunities:

We are not just looking for executors; we are looking for future leaders. As we scale, we offer clear pathways for both horizontal and vertical growth:

Vertical Growth: High-performers will be prioritized for future Team Lead and Department Head positions as we expand our production cells.

Horizontal Growth: We value personal development. We provide opportunities to broaden your skill set across different AI tools, creative directions, or operational management, ensuring you remain at the forefront of the industry.

Long-term Partnership: We invest in your evolution. If you help us build the systems today, you will lead the teams of tomorrow.



?? HOW TO APPLY (Read Carefully)

Because we are a "Detail-Oriented" agency, we auto-reject all copy-paste and bot applications. To be considered, you must follow these instructions exactly:

1. Subject Line: Change your subject line to: [Job Title] Expert - [Your Favorite Interior Design Style] - [Your Name]

(Example: Senior AI Artist - Modern Organic - Maria Santos)

2. The First Sentence: Start your cover letter with exactly this phrase: "I have 100% redundant power and internet, ready for the 10-7 PHT shift."

3. Include the Following:

• A link to your specific Luxury Portfolio (Google Drive, Behance, or Website).

• A screenshot of your PC Specs (RAM, GPU, CPU) and a Speedtest result.

4. The Secret Question: In your message, tell me: "What is the most important thing to get right when doing a Twilight Conversion to make it look expensive?"

If you do not follow these 4 steps, your application will be ignored immediately.

title: Social Media & Marketing Specialist
description:
Absolutely — your job post has strong content, it just needs tightening, consistency, and a clearer structure. I’ve rewritten it into a polished, professional, and compelling full?time Digital Marketer role that reflects what you’re actually looking for.



Digital Marketer (Full?Time) — Remote

Industry: International Education & Visa Services

Are you a results?driven digital marketer who can turn clicks into high?quality student leads — not just traffic? We’re hiring a full?time Digital Marketer to manage our website, lead generation campaigns, and all social media platforms for our fast?growing global education and visa agency.

If you thrive on KPIs, love building creative campaigns, and understand the international student journey, you’ll feel right at home here.



What You’ll Do

- Manage and 
 paid campaigns across
, Meta, Instagram, TikTok, Google Ads, YouTube, LinkedIn, and emerging platforms.

- Generate high?intent, conversion?ready leads for international education and visa pathways.

- Oversee and update our website, landing pages, and funnels to maximise conversions.

- Create compelling ad creatives, hooks, and messaging tailored to Gen Z and international student audiences.

- Analyse campaign performance daily and adjust strategies to meet weekly and monthly KPIs.

- Manage and grow all social media platforms with consistent, engaging content.

- Collaborate with operations and admissions teams to ensure lead quality and conversion alignment.

- Lead Volume: Meet weekly and monthly targets aligned with campaign budgets.

- Cost Efficiency: Maintain competitive CPL across all platforms.

- Conversion Impact: Bonus incentives tied to successful student conversions.

- Creativity: Produce scroll?stopping content that resonates with international student markets.



Advantage - Candidates with experience in the following will have an advantage:

- Student visa processes

- Education recruitment

- International student markets (especially PH)

- KIP 



Work Arrangement

- Full?time remote role

- Flexible hours with weekly reporting and alignment meetings

- Performance review after probation

- Opportunities for growth and long?term career development



Who You Are

- KPI?driven, analytical, and obsessed with optimisation

- Creative thinker who understands trends, hooks, and platform behaviour

- Proactive, reliable, and able to work independently

- Passionate about helping students achieve global education opportunities



How to Apply

Send your CV, portfolio of past campaigns, and a short note describing your best?performing lead generation strategy.

title: Amazon PPC Specialist
description:
About the Role

We are looking for an experienced Amazon PPC Specialist to manage and scale advertising efforts for launch and growth-stage products in the Amazon marketplace.



This role requires strong ownership, analytical thinking, and hands-on PPC experience. You will oversee products end-to-end from pre-launch research to PPC optimization, while supporting daily operations and contributing to team growth.



Note: Completion of a sample task is required. Only applicants who complete the task will be shortlisted.



Responsibilities

• Manage new product launches from market, keyword, and competitor research to PPC execution.

• Build, optimize, and scale Amazon PPC campaigns (SP, SB, SD).

• Optimize budgets and bids to improve ACOS, TACOS, and overall profitability.

• Support organic keyword ranking growth through strategic PPC and sales velocity.

• Improve conversion rate (CVR) by identifying opportunities across ads, keywords, and listings.

• Identify gaps and optimization opportunities within existing marketing and PPC strategies.

• Monitor Amazon US marketplace performance, including keyword movement and competitor activity.

• Prepare performance reports and insights for internal stakeholders.

• Support internal PPC processes, documentation, and operational improvements.



Requirements

• Proven experience managing Amazon PPC campaigns

• Strong ownership mindset and accountability

• Logical, data-driven thinking

• High proficiency in Excel and Google Sheets (formulas, analysis, reporting)

• Good understanding of marketing funnels and buyer intent

• Comfortable analyzing performance data and trends

• Highly organized, self-motivated, and detail-oriented

• Excellent communication and collaboration skills

• Tools experience:

• Amazon Seller Central & Advertising Console

• Helium 10

• Data Dive

• Pacvue or similar PPC management tools

• Google Sheets / Excel

• No moonlighting during work hours



HOW TO APPLY:

To apply, simply message us.

title: Handwriting Decoder / Data Entry Specialist (Full-Time, 40 hrs/week)
description:
Work From Home – Long-Term Opportunity



We are looking for reliable and detail-oriented workers from the Philippines to help decode handwritten information from scanned documents and enter the data accurately into our system. Full training is provided. Immediate hiring.



Position Details



Job Title: Handwriting Decoder / Data Entry Specialist

Hours: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM PST (California Time)

Equivalent PH Time: 1:00 AM – 9:00 AM PHT

Work Duration: 40 hours per week

Start Date: Immediately after the interview (same day)



Job Description



You will review scanned handwritten forms, interpret the names, addresses, and signature details, and enter them into our database. This job requires accuracy, consistency, and strong attention to detail.



Training will be provided on the first day.



Compensation

 • Training Day Payment: 1,000 PHP paid the same day if you stay until 5 PM PST (even if not hired)

 • Trial Week (Week 1): 5,000 PHP

 • Weekly Salary After Trial: 5,000–6,000 PHP/week based on performance

 • Payment Method: Weekly via Wise (TransferWise) only

 • Applicants must have or create a Wise account to receive payment.



Requirements

 • Ability to work 9 AM–5 PM PST (1 AM–9 AM PHT) for the first week - flexible hours from week 2.

 • Fast and stable internet

 • Desktop or laptop in good condition (not mobile)

 • Strong attention to detail

 • Ability to read and interpret handwritten text

 • Must have Signal Messenger installed on phone and computer (team communication)

 • Must join the interview with your camera ON

 • Must have or be willing to create a Wise account for payments



Mandatory Interview Details



All applicants must attend the interview:



US Time: Wednesday, February 4 – 9:00 AM PST

Philippines Time: Thursday, February 5 – 1:00 AM PHT

Interview Link: 

Camera required.



If hired, you will begin working immediately after the interview and complete a full eight-hour training shift until 5 PM PST.



How to Apply



Please apply by sending the following message:



“I can work 9 AM–5 PM PST and I will attend the interview on Feb 4th at 9 AM PST.”



We look forward to meeting you.



Please go back and read this entire post again to make sure you understand it and follow all steps.

title: Sr Email Marketing & Launch Copywriter
description:
About Us

We’re a fast-growing education company serving experienced software engineers who want real-world Rust skills and real career outcomes. Our flagship offers are mentor-led, cohort-based programs focused on shipping production-grade projects and landing Rust-heavy roles.



 is one of our main revenue channels. We use it to fill cohorts, book sales calls, and reactivate our warm audience. We’re hiring someone to own this function end-to-end.



Role Overview

You will own the strategy, copy, and execution of
 campaigns that drive launches, bookings, reactivations, and long-term revenue from our list. This is a senior, full-time role for someone who wants clear ownership, measurable impact, and a long-term seat on the team.



You are not “writing some
s.” You are building a repeatable
 machine that keeps our calendar full and our cohorts sold out.



What You’ll Own

1.  Launch Campaigns (Cohorts & Fast-Cash Promos)

Plan and write complete launch sequences for our cohorts and promo offers (pre-launch, open cart, objections, FAQ, deadline, last call, sold-out, etc.).

Standardize, document, and templatize launches so they’re easy to clone and improve.



2. Evergreen Nurture & Segmentation

Build and maintain evergreen sequences that warm new subscribers and move them toward a call or application.

Segment based on behavior and stage (new leads, engaged, inactive, past applicants, buyers) so people get the right messages at the right time.



3. Show-Up & No-Show Sequences

Write and optimize sequences that increase show-up rates for booked calls.

Create follow-up for no-shows and no-buys to recover missed revenue and keep good leads in motion.



4. Reactivation Campaigns

Run quarterly reactivation campaigns for cold or inactive subscribers to generate “found” revenue from the list.



What Success Looks Like in the First 90 Days

- 3 complete launch sequences live, documented, and reusable.

- 1 evergreen nurture sequence live, for new leads.

- Show-up rate on
-sourced calls improved vs. baseline.

- At least 1 reactivation campaign shipped with clear revenue attribution.

- Clear
 playbook (templates, frameworks, naming) the team can understand and reuse.



Requirements

- 3+ years professional B2C
 copy experience.

- Proven track record owning full launch/email sequences (not just individual
s).

- Strong understanding of offer positioning, sequencing, and deadlines for high-ticket educational or coaching products.

- Ability to write in a clear, human voice that resonates with senior, technical audiences.

- Comfortable with at least 3-hour overlap with US pacific time zone, async with a distributed team, and being accountable to numbers (revenue, bookings, show rates).



Bonus

- Experience with technical or software developer audiences.

- Familiarity with platforms like Kartra, ActiveCampaign, or similar.

- Comfortable pulling basic numbers from dashboards/CRMs to see what’s working.



How to Apply

In your application, include:

- A brief personal intro (2–5 short sentences) in your own words.

- 1–2 examples of launch or promo sequences you’ve written (cohort, course, or high-ticket offers).

- A short note explaining how you approach writing launch
s for a high-ticket cohort program.

- Your monthly salary expectation in USD (full-time) and your official
 address.



Application Question (Required):

1. Which part of the
 lifecycle do you enjoy owning most? (launches, nurture, reactivation, post-purchase, etc.) What
 platforms have you worked in?

2. Briefly describe one launch
 sequence you’ve owned end-to-end.

3. In 5–7 bullet points, outline:

- the audience

- the goal of the sequence

- how you structured the sequence (early ? middle ? final
s)

- one decision you made to avoid audience fatigue



Applications that skip any of the above will not be considered.

title: Strategic Executive Assistant / Real Estate Research VA
description:
About the Role

We are a U.S.-based real estate investment and development business looking for a proactive, analytical Executive Assistant to help the CEO think bigger and scale smarter, and to help create this new business. The Executive Assistant will be pivotal in creating the business lines and new staff that will be needed.

Your job is to help surface ideas, opportunities, and patterns — especially around properties that can support multiple units, ADUs/DADUs, or backyard development.



This is not a basic admin role.

 

What You’ll Do

• Research properties and markets that fit defined investment criteria

• Identify opportunities for multi-unit or ADU/DADU expansion

• Summarize findings into clear notes, spreadsheets, or short briefs

• Help organize ideas, assumptions, and next steps

• Prepare weekly summaries of opportunities and insights

• Support the CEO with light executive assistance (tracking, follow-ups)

 

This Role Is a Fit If You…

• Enjoy research, analysis, and pattern recognition

• Can turn messy information into clear summaries

• Are curious and proactive (you bring ideas, not just tasks)

• Are comfortable working with ambiguity

• Want to grow long-term with a real estate business

 

Requirements

• Strong written and spoken English

• Comfortable with online research and spreadsheets

• Organized, reliable, and self-directed

• Reliable internet

• Able to overlap 3–4 hours with U.S. Pacific Time

 

Pay & Schedule

• $5/hour for first 3 months (training period)

• After 3 months: $6/hour + $100 bonus (performance-based)

• 20–40 hours/week

• Long-term role with growth

 

How to Apply (Read Carefully)

To be considered, you must submit all of the following:

1. Resume

2. Short written answer to this question:

“How would you help a real estate investor scale smarter, not just work harder?”

3. A short video recording (1–2 minutes) introducing yourself and explaining why you are a good fit

4. Screenshot of your internet speed

5. Your availability in U.S. Pacific Time

Applications without a video recording will NOT be considered.

 

What Success Looks Like

• You consistently bring new ideas or opportunities to the table

• Research is organized, useful, and repeatable

• The CEO gains clarity and leverage, not more work

title: Graphic Designer
description:
KeaBabies is looking for a highly creative and detail-oriented Graphic Designer to join our global team. You will work closely with our Senior Graphic Designer in Singapore to create engaging, high-converting product images for Amazon and other platforms.



This role combines design expertise, AI-powered creativity, and e-commerce product research to help us continuously improve our listings and visual branding.



Key Responsibilities:



• Design Creation – Conceptualize and produce high-quality images for product listings, marketing materials, and brand assets.

• AI-Powered Design – Leverage AI tools for image generation, enhancement, and creative concept development.

• Amazon Product Research – Research competitor listings, market trends, and customer feedback with customer focus to spark ideas that enhance listing visuals and content.

• Collaboration – Work closely with the design team to brainstorm creative concepts that resonate with our audience.

• Image Review & Feedback – Assess images for quality, brand alignment, and compliance with Amazon guidelines; provide feedback to improve visual appeal and performance.

• File Management – Organize and maintain digital image libraries for efficient retrieval and version control.



Requirements

• Diploma or degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or related field.

• 5+ years of experience in graphic design (e-commerce or product listing experience preferred).

• Strong portfolio with e-commerce-related projects.

• Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator).

• Open to using AI tools for image generation (e.g., Midjourney, ChatGPT, Adobe Firefly, etc.); prior experience is a plus.

• Experience in e-commerce, especially with USA Amazon listings, will be a big plus.

• Strong understanding of composition, color, and visual storytelling.

• Good research skills and the ability to extract actionable insights from competitor listings.

• Strong organizational and time-management abilities.

• Excellent communication skills for working with a remote, cross-cultural team.

• Ability to meet tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

• Experience working with remote teams is a plus.

• Owns a MacOS computer or laptop with stable internet access.



Take note of these application instructions:

1. Make sure to include your resume and portfolio (either file or link) as you message us.

2. Leave a message with the title: "I want to be your next Graphic Designer!"



NOTE: No moonlighting is allowed during work hours in this role.

title: Virtual Assitant
description:

title: Product Support Specialist - MaverickRE (Philippines Only)
description:
You may apply using this link: 



About Us



Ylopo, LLC is a rapidly growing marketing and technology company providing internet marketing services and proprietary lead generation and engagement software to successful real estate agents across the country. We are seeking an outgoing, tech savvy individual to join our growing team.



 



Why work for Ylopo?



At Ylopo we offer tea
mbers:



a commitment to personal development,



guidance and support at a high level through interfacing with our Executive Team to prioritize goals as a company,



excellent leadership and mentoring for our entry-level to senior staff, and recognition of outstanding efforts,



team building events, team lunches/ happy hours, and other company wide events



a supportive, caring environment dedicated to continuous learning and growth.



Summary:



The Product Support tea
mber is responsible for supporting current MaverickRE clients and coordinating, implementing, documenting and escalating CRM and TMS (Transaction Management System) data entry and advanced configurations to facilitate the onboarding process and data validation for the MaverickRE software. This role will be remote call,
, Intercom chat and phone based.



This position requires excellent communication skills, as the Product Support tea
mber will communicate frequently with clients using Intercom Chat tool, Zoom video conferencing and
. This tea
mber will work closely with MaverickRE’s Application Support and Client Success teams. Tea
mbers well-suited to this role will have a track record of being client-focused and providing exceptional service, both internally and externally. Applicants should also have exceptional attention to detail and organizational skills with the patience to accomplish repetitive precise tasks. Candidates are not required to have prior real estate or marketing experience, but should be willing to learn the intricacies of the MaverickRE product and the nuances and functionality of the CRMs and TMS tools we integrate with. Overall we are looking for candidates who are quick-thinking, detail-oriented and who are comfortable with technology and data entry/standardization.



 



Requirements: 



Knowledge of CRM or TMS software and previous experience entering or editing data within these tools

Prior Excel or similar spreadsheet software usage, beginner to intermediate skills

Experience supporting and directly communicating with clients

Jira, ClickUP, Trello, Monday (i.e. ticketing) software experience

Zendesk (i.e.
 inbox/help desk) software experience

Consistent work habits and strong work ethic

Strong organizational skills and attention to detail

Ability to multitask, and work independently toward deadlines

Strong written and verbal communication skills, ability to work well in a small group setting and in a remote work environment

Ability to understand and convey detailed information

Understanding of real estate and the real estate profession a plus, but not necessary

 



Responsibilities:



Frontline client support via chat software 

Management and understanding of internal help articles and client facing documentation

Manually export, normalize, input data into TMS software in order to aggregate and unify data between CRM and transaction records

Verify existing records to ensure data standards

Confirm TMS-side updates are reflected in MaverickRE tool and powering reliant features

Provide overview and status updates to internal teams and clients in technical onboarding phase

Communicate disparities or insufficient data within the context of the MaverickRE system requirements to escalate to CSM team

 



System Requirements:



Processor for both main and backup computer should be 2ghz and above, Intel core 5/7 is highly required

Ram should be at least 16 gig with 100 gb Free disk space

USB headset with noise canceling feature

At least 20 mbps & up wired connection for main isp

Back up internet is a must (strictly no USB Sticks allowed)

 



Shift Schedule: 9AM - 6PM Pacific Standard



Rate: PHP 45,000



MAGIC WORD: YLOPER

title: Video Editor - Full-Time, Long-Term ($950/month + Bonuses)
description:
We're Sautille, a fast-growing UK toddler shoe brand. We're looking for a full-time Video Editor to create conversion-focused video ads for Meta 
/Instagram).



The job:

• Edit video ads that convert — hooks, pacing, subtitles, zooms, b-roll sequencing

• Work from audio files, scripts, and briefs provided by our Creative Strategist

• Deliver multiple variations per ad (we call this a "batch")

• Source b-roll footage when needed

• Implement feedback and improve based on references



This is execution, not strategy. You receive the audio, the format, and the instructions — then you make it happen.



Workload:

• ~3 batches/day (1 batch = 1 ad + 3-5 variations)

• Full-time: ~40 hours/week, 6 days/week

• Clear weekly schedule planned in advance



We're looking for:

• E-commerce video editing experience (Meta ads, not just TikTok or vlogs)

• Ability to create hooks that capture attention in the first 2 seconds

• Eye for quality footage — you know what feels authentic and engaging

• Volume + quality mindset — fast and clean, not slow and over-perfectionist

• Minimal revisions needed before an ad is ready

• CapCut proficiency



What you get:

• $950/month starting salary (negotiable)

• Performance bonuses for every winning ad

• Health insurance covered

• Gym / sport membership covered

• Salary growth as you improve

• Long-term stability (2026 and beyond)

• Full training program when you start



Hiring process:

• Apply via form ? Paid trial week (up to 5 candidates) ? Selection ? You're in



All details about the role, process, and how to apply are here: 







Please read everything carefully before applying.

title: DTC Video Editor (Meta Ads & AI Voice-Over)
description:
We are looking for a full-time DTC Video Editor focused on executing high-volume Meta ads at scale.



This is an execution-focused role. Scripts, angles and overall strategy are provided. Your role is to turn these into high-performing Meta ads through strong editing, pacing and AI voice-over execution.



Responsibilities



Editing Meta ads across different formats and lengths (UGC, product-led, voice-over ads)



Turning provided scripts into high-quality AI voice-overs using ElevenLabs



Minor script fine-tuning only when needed for natural AI voice pacing and pronunciation



Matching voice-over timing with visuals, captions and hooks



Creating multiple variants per video for testing and scaling



Working fast while maintaining consistency and quality at volume



Requirements



Proven experience editing Meta DTC ads



Strong understanding of pacing, hooks and retention



Fluent English (required for AI voice-over quality and pronunciation)



Experience with ElevenLabs or similar AI voice-over tools



Experience with CapCut Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro, or a comparable editing program



Able to follow clear creative direction without adding unnecessary creative changes



Comfortable working in a high-volume, performance-driven environment



Compensation



Salary is not fixed and is based on output and volume (number of videos produced)



We test a high volume of videos every month, so once you are accepted and your work meets our standards, there will be consistent and ongoing work



With steady output, this results in a stable and competitive monthly income



Performance-based bonuses are paid when ads perform well due to strong editing and execution



Not a fit if



You only do cinematic or storytelling-focused edits



You prefer creative concepting over execution



Application Instructions



Start your application message with the word Apple and briefly mention your experience with Meta ads and ElevenLabs.

Applications that do not follow this instruction will be ignored.

title: Amazon Wholesale VA (Experience Required)
description:

ing US suppliers)

title: Customer Support Agent
description:
KittySpout is looking for a Customer Support Agent to join our team!

In your application/subject message to us put the word "KITTY" on your application, along with the video introduction as mentioned in the job post below, or you will be denied.



As our Customer Support Agent, you will be responsible for managing all customer interactions, resolving inquiries across multiple channels 
, Social Media, and Live Chat), and ensuring every cat parent has a world-class experience. You will turn frustrated customers into brand advocates by providing fast, empathetic, and effective solutions.



We are looking to hire someone with 3+ years of work experience in high-volume e-commerce support. The ideal candidate has prior experience with DTC brands, understands the importance of "first-contact resolution," and knows how to manage a heavy ticket volume without sacrificing quality or brand voice.



Who are we?

At KittySpout, we are transforming cats and their parents’ lives by developing products designed with the help of expert veterinarians to create products that make taking care of cats easier while also helping improve the health and happiness of cats around the world. We've scaled quickly to become a multi 8-figure brand in under 4 years through viral digital marketing. KittySpout has helped over 600,000+ cat owners in just 4 years since launching with a small (but mighty) core team of under 20 people — and we are looking to continue our growth by finding a great customer support agent to play a pivotal role in scaling!



What is our culture like & who is a good fit?

Culture-fit is our #1 factor when hiring! We have a genuine will-to-win. No work is beneath us if it moves us towards our goals. We utilize creativity to do more with less – and quickly. We use data to make decisions and live by the following four core values: work smart, overdeliver, speed is king, and better everyday. We love learning – every problem is an opportunity to grow.



If you want a stress-free corporate 9-5 job, this isn’t it.



If you want to challenge yourself and shape a fast-growing company, work directly with the founders, and see huge career growth by playing a big role in scaling it to $100m+… If you want to drive results with a group of passionate, smart, hardworking people, work in an environment without politics or corporate chicanery, and play a big part in our growth being hands-on and active, all while having a generous performance bonus structure — then you’ve come to the right place.



Key Objectives

Maintain a high volume of ticket resolutions (60-80+ tickets per day) while maintaining a friendly, helpful tone.

Apply problem-solving principles to resolve shipping, product, and technical issues autonomously.

Operate with a high degree of autonomy, managing your inbox efficiently to meet SLA (Service Level Agreement) deadlines without needing hand-holding.

Quickly learn and master new tools like Richpanel, Shopify, and shipping platforms as our tech stack evolves.

Ensure every interaction meets our quality standards, minimizing the need for customer follow-ups or escalations.

Maintain clear, proactive communication with the operations team to report recurring product issues or shipping delays.

Drive revenue by offering smart upsells or alternatives when a product is out of stock or being returned.



Requirements

Fully remote.

Fluent in English (Written and Spoken).

Proven experience in Customer Support for DTC e-commerce brands.

Proven experience with support software (Gorgias, Zendesk, or Richpanel) and Shopify.

Speed & Accuracy: Ability to type quickly and navigate multiple tabs/tools simultaneously.

No issue working overtime or on weekends if needed. You’re passionate about your work and excited by the idea of helping thousands of customers.

Excellent cultural fit as per our values above.

Excited to play a big role in scaling the company and work closely with the founders.



KPI’S you will own

Daily Ticket Quota: Consistent resolution of assigned tickets.

Average Response Time: Under 1 hour during shift.

CSAT Score: Maintain a 4.8/5.0 or higher customer satisfaction rating.



Accountabilities

Resolve customer inquiries across
, Chat, and Social Media DM’s.

Process refunds, replacements, and order cancellations according to company policy.

Tag and categorize tickets to provide data-driven feedback to the product team.

Update the internal Knowledge Base/FAQ as new customer pain points emerge.

Proactively identify and report "fire" situations (e.g., website bugs, mass shipping delays).



This Role Is Not For You If

You are a perfectionist who spends 20 minutes drafting a single
. With high daily volume, success in this role demands efficiency and the use of macros/templates combined with quick personalization.

You thrive in highly collaborative environments with frequent meetings. This is a high-autonomy, "heads-down" role where you will be working through the ticket queue independently for the majority of your shift.

You struggle with fast-paced changes. Our policies and promotions can change overnight, and you must be able to pivot and learn new protocols instantly without frustration.



How Our Hiring Works & How We Operate

When hiring, we’ll work with you to define the KPIs you’ll be responsible for and set targets. This removes ambiguity around wondering if you’re doing a good job after you start.



To apply, please submit a short video introduction (max 2 minutes) telling us who you are and what you’re great at.



If you’re a strong match, we’ll invite you to a single, intensive interview covering both technical ability (via mock tickets) and culture fit

We move quickly and aim to hire the right candidate within 5–7 days. We pride ourselves on timely responses—we won't leave you hanging.



Salary Expectation

USD $1,000 – $1,500 per month (based on experience and expertise)

title: Executive Assistant (Operations Support + Video Editing)
description:
“This is a full-time position requiring your full commitment. If you have other clients or ongoing commitments, please do not apply.”



Hey everyone! We’re Jarex, a growing Philippine based Marketing company working with amazing U.S. based clients. We’re looking for a highly organized, proactive Executive Assistant who is strong in operations support and also knows how to edit videos.



This role is ideal for someone who enjoys organizing, supporting business operations, and taking ownership of tasks, while also having solid video editing skills.





What You’ll Do:

• Provide Executive Assistant and operations support

• Manage tasks, priorities, and deadlines using Notion and internal systems

• Organize files, folders, and assets

• Support internal workflows and client projects

• Edit short-form and long-form videos using CapCut

• Create thumbnails and graphics using Canva

• Follow SOPs and help improve documentation

• Communicate clearly with the internal team





Skills We’re Looking For:

• Executive Assistant or Operations experience

• Strong video editing experience (CapCut required)

• Canva design experience

• Highly organized and detail-oriented

• Proactive and accountable

• Good English communication and grammar

• Familiar with Notion, Slack, and Google Workspace

• Bonus: Experience with Go High Level





EXPERIENCE LEVEL:

• At least 1 year experience as an Executive Assistant, Operations Assistant, or Video Editor is a MUST

• Willingness to learn and grow





TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:



1. Good computer setup



Recommended:

CPU - Ryzen 5 (5th Gen or Above) / Intel i5 (11th Gen or Above)

Memory - 16GB RAM or Above



2. Reliable internet connection



Wired Internet Speed of at least 100mbps and above





WORK SCHEDULE:

• Full-time, Monday to Friday

• Working hours. (Night Shift): 9 PM – 6 AM Philippine time





APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS:

To ensure you’ve read this job post thoroughly and to help us understand your attention to detail, please follow these instructions carefully:

1.
 your application to: 

2. Subject Line: “Executive Assistant (Ops + Video) – [Your Full Name]”

3. In the
, include:

- A brief introduction about yourself and why you’re a good fit

- Answer this question:

"What’s one system or tool you use to stay organized and why?"

- Share a link to your portfolio or sample video edits

- A 1-2 minute video introducing yourself and why this role fits you

Upload to Google Drive and include the link

- Screenshot of your computer specs and internet speed

- Attach your updated resume

4. End your
 with this phrase (required):

“I take ownership and follow through.”



*Important Note: Applications that do not follow these steps will not be considered. We’re looking for someone detail-oriented who can follow instructions well.



We’re excited to see your creativity and hopefully welcome you to the team!

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

title: Sales Development Representative (SDR)
description:
Work From Home | Full-Time

Schedule: Australian Business Hours (AEST)

Compensation: $1800 AUD



About the Role

Infinity22 is an Australian accounting and advisory firm seeking an experienced Sales Development Representative (SDR) to join our growing remote sales team in the Philippines.

In this role, you will be responsible for outbound lead generation and booking qualified meetings for our Australia-based Business Development Managers. This is a structured, metrics-driven role ideal for someone who enjoys cold calling, CRM-based workflows, and consistent performance targets.



Key Responsibilities:

-Make 150–200 outbound calls per day using Aircall

-Source and research leads using Firmable

-Qualify prospects and manage pipelines in HubSpot CRM

-Follow up with warm and existing leads to book sales meetings

-Schedule qualified appointments for Business Development Managers

-Maintain accurate and up-to-date CRM records

-Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to improve outreach performance



Requirements

-5+ years of experience in B2B sales, SDR/BDR, or Inside Sales

-Strong background in outbound cold calling (75%+ of daily activity)

-Excellent spoken and written English communication skills

-Hands-on experience with HubSpot CRM (required)

-Experience with Aircall and Firmable is highly preferred

-Highly organized, self-motivated, and comfortable working remotely

-Experience selling to AU, UK, or US markets is a strong advantage



Work Schedule

Full-time, remote positionAustralian business hours (AEST)

Occasional flexibility for early or late meetings as required



Why Join Infinity22?

Work with a high-performing Australian sales team

Clear career progression to Senior SDR or Account Executive

Structured sales processes with strong leadership support

Exposure to industry-leading tools: HubSpot, Firmable, and AircallSupportive, professional, and growth-focused work culture



How to Apply

If you are a confident, results-driven SDR who thrives in outbound B2B sales and wants to grow your career with a global team, we encourage you to apply.

title: Sales Operations & CRM Systems Coordinator
description:
About Us



We are a healthcare services company supporting medical practices and care delivery organizations. We operate with a lean team and rely on clean systems, disciplined execution, and consistent follow-through. Accuracy, reliability, and process discipline are critical in our environment.



We are hiring a Sales Operations & CRM Systems Coordinator to manage the day-to-day execution of our outreach, follow-ups, and CRM systems. This is a pure operations role. You are not responsible for strategy, messaging, or closing.



Your job is to ensure our sales and outreach systems run flawlessly every day, with zero dropped leads or missed responses.



Core Responsibilities



1. Outreach & Follow-Up Operations

2. Execute outbound
 and follow-up sequences exactly as documented

3. Load, maintain, and update contact lists provided by the team

4. Send reminders, confirmations, and re-engagement
s per SOP

5. Monitor outreach activity and escalate issues when workflows break

6. Ensure all outreach activity is accurately logged in the CRM



CRM & Data Management



1. Maintain clean, accurate, and up-to-date records in Pipedrive or a similar CRM

2. Update deal stages, account status, and activity notes in real time

3. Tag and categorize leads and accounts correctly

4. Ensure no inbound inquiry or response is lost or untracked

5. Produce basic operational reports when requested



Inbox & Response Routing



1. Monitor shared inboxes for inbound responses

2. Route replies to the appropriate internal tea
mber promptly

3. Escalate time-sensitive or high-priority messages immediately

4.  Ensure internal response SLAs are consistently met

5. Process Discipline & System Hygiene

6. Follow documented SOPs precisely and consistently

7. Perform daily, weekly, and monthly CRM and system hygiene

8. Identify and flag gaps, bottlenecks, or breakpoints in workflows

9. Keep trackers, logs, and documentation accurate at all times

10. Support internal reviews or audits with clean records



Requirements (Non-Negotiable)



1. Prior experience working with CRMs (Pipedrive, HubSpot, or similar)

2. Strong attention to detail and process discipline

3. Comfort working with spreadsheets, inboxes, and outreach tools

4. Ability to execute tasks accurately without reminders

5. Reliable internet and consistent daily availability

6. Clear written English for internal communication

7. Preferred Experience (Strong Plus)

 8. Hands-on experience with Pipedrive CRM

9. Hands-on experience with Mailchimp or similar
 platforms



Experience supporting sales operations, lead operations, or B2B outreach



Experience working with healthcare or regulated service businesses



Familiarity with CRM automation and outreach workflows



Basic understanding of
 deliverability and sending limits



You will not handle protected health information (PHI), but discretion and compliance awareness are expected.



What This Role Is Not



Not a sales or closing role



Not a strategy or decision-making role



Not a marketing or copywriting position



Not customer service or clinical support



This role is focused on execution, accuracy, and consistency.



Performance Expectations



Zero missed responses or follow-ups



Clean and accurate CRM data at all times



Reliable daily execution without reminders



Strict adherence to documented processes



High trust from the team due to precision and follow-through



Compensation & Structure



Competitive monthly compensation based on experience



Long-term role for strong performers



Clear responsibilities, SOPs, and expectations

title: Experienced Bookkeeper – High Demand Electrical (Fully Remote)
description:
High Demand Electrical is seeking an experienced and reliable bookkeeper to support the financial operations of our electrical contracting business. This role is fully remote and best suited to someone with a strong understanding of Australian tax and payroll requirements, who is comfortable working independently and takes pride in accurate, well organised work.



This is a long term, ongoing role for the right person.



Role details

Part time position

20 hours per week

Fully remote

Flexible working hours, with agreed deadlines

$6 AUD per hour

Ongoing work for the right candidate



You will work directly with the business owner and have responsibility for the day to day bookkeeping function.



Key responsibilities

Complete bank and credit card reconciliations

Prepare and support BAS lodgements

Process payroll and support payroll compliance, including super and STP requirements

Prepare and issue invoices and follow up outstanding receivables

Manage supplier payments and accounts

Track expenses across multiple jobs and projects

Process timesheets and job cost information

Prepare and submit ABA payment files

Maintain accurate and up to date financial records

Provide general bookkeeping and administrative support as required



What we are looking for

Demonstrated experience with Australian bookkeeping, BAS, payroll, and ATO compliance

Strong working knowledge of Australian tax and payroll rules

Excellent attention to detail and accuracy

Confident and efficient using Xero

Experience working with small businesses, ideally within trades or construction

Able to work independently and manage workloads without supervision

Well organised, reliable, and deadline driven

Positive attitude, professional communication, and a solutions-focused mindset



What we value

Accuracy and consistency

Clear communication

Accountability and ownership of work

A practical approach to problem solving

Long term working relationships



How to apply

Please send your application letter and CV to 
 without relevant Australian bookkeeping experience will not be considered.



If you are an experienced bookkeeper who understands Australian compliance and is looking for stable, fully remote part time work, we encourage you to apply.

title: Night Shift Coordinator / Team Leader

title: Full-Time Remote Shopify & WordPress Developer (Long-Term)
description:
Lundoc Media is a growing digital marketing agency working with clients in Canada and the United States, mainly in e-commerce and service-based businesses. We build, manage, and improve websites for long-term clients and are looking for a full-time remote developer based in the Philippines to join our team.



Main Focus (Primary Responsibility)

Shopify theme customization

Creating and editing Shopify sections

Fixing layout, CSS, and basic JavaScript issues

Working on Shopify product pages, collections, and theme settings



Also Very Important

Strong experience with WordPress

Solid knowledge of WooCommerce

Fixing plugin conflicts, layout issues, and checkout problems

Working on existing client websites (not only new builds)



What You Will Do

Work on real client projects (not test or demo websites)

Implement tasks based on clear written instructions

Fix bugs and improve existing websites

Follow best practices (staging, backups when needed)

Requirements

Proven experience with Shopify (themes, sections, customizations)

Comfortable with HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript

Working Hours

40 hours per week

Remote

What We Offer

How to Apply

Please include:
