title: Appointment Setter & Sales Support
description:
Are you passionate about connecting with people and making an impact? We’re on the lookout for an enthusiastic Appointment Setter to join our dynamic team at Dale Carnegie Australia! This role is perfect for someone who thrives in a supportive environment, loves customer service, and is excited by the prospect of driving our success forward.



As an Appointment Setter, you’ll play a crucial role in following up on leads from our workshops and marketing efforts. Reporting directly to the Managing Director, your day-to-day will involve reaching out to our valued customers with confidence, booking meetings with our Senior Sales Consultants, and ensuring our database stays up-to-date. If you have a professional phone manner, love making calls, and have an unwavering ‘never give up’ attitude, this could be the perfect role for you!



What’s in it for you? Aside from being part of a team that truly values its members, you’ll enjoy a generous bonus system for every successful appointment you make. We’re committed to your growth, offering comprehensive training opportunities for those who are dedicated to the long haul.



We’re proud to say our Virtual Assistants have been with us for over three years, and we treat each one of them with the respect and opportunities they deserve. If you’re excited to be a part of a company where your efforts are recognised and rewarded, we’d love to hear from you!



-----To apply, please send us a video message explaining why you'd like to be considered for this position. Tell us why you’re eager to join our team at Dale Carnegie and what makes you the perfect fit. We can’t wait to hear from you!

title: Podcast Video Editor
description:
About the Role



We’re looking for a Podcast Video Editor to transform long-form podcast recordings into polished full-length video episodes and high-performing short clips for social media. In this full-time remote role (with some EST timezone overlap), you'll take raw footage (with a rough cut provided) and craft engaging, cinematic videos ready for YouTube and beyond. You’ll join a young, mission-driven team (currently in stealth mode) that’s collaborative, ambitious, and passionate about storytelling. If you know how to make content stand out like Diary of a CEO, On Purpose, The Mel Robbins Podcast, or Call Her Daddy, we want you on our team!





Who You Are



- Skilled Video Editor – Proficient in DaVinci Resolve (preferred) or Adobe Premiere Pro.



- Creative Storyteller – Strong sense of pacing, timing, and visual rhythm to make content pop.



- Social-Savvy – Up-to-date on TikTok/Reels trends and know what makes clips go viral.



- Organized & Reliable – Highly organized, able to manage multiple episodes on tight deadlines.



- Team Player – Collaborative and receptive to feedback, with great communication skills.



- Passionate & Eager – Genuinely passionate about podcasts and digital media, and always hungry to learn. (Experience with podcast or long-form editing is a plus but not required – attitude and willingness to grow matter most.)





Responsibilities



Edit Long-Form Episodes – Turn raw multi-camera podcast footage into compelling full-length video episodes for YouTube.



Create Short-Form Clips – Repurpose the best 
nts into catchy vertical videos for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.



Cinematic Touch – Apply a cinematic editing style with captions, music, color grading, and transitions. Deliver videos with the engaging quality of top podcast shows (think Diary of a CEO, On Purpose).



Maintain Quality & Brand – Ensure consistency in quality and style across all videos, aligned with our brand’s look and feel.



Iterate & Collaborate – Work from a rough cut, implement feedback quickly, and collaborate with the team to continuously improve each episode.



How to Apply



If this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you! To apply, please:



1. Portfolio – Send us your video editing portfolio (especially any podcast or long-form projects you’ve done).



2. Intro Video (1–2 min) – Include a link to a short video of you answering: “Which podcast or video show’s editing style do you admire, and how would you bring that quality into your edits?” (This is a must – we want to see your insight and personality.)



Applications without a portfolio or intro video will not be considered.





Hiring Process



1. Application Review – We’ll review your application materials to shortlist candidates.



2. Interview – Short video call for those shortlisted (to talk about your experience, skills, and fit).



3. Paid Test Edit – Finalists will be given a small paid editing test to complete (simulating our podcast workflow).



If you’re ambitious, creative, and ready to grow with a fast-moving team, we can’t wait to meet you – apply now and let’s create something amazing together!

title: AI Video Content Creator
description:
We are looking for a creative and reliable Full-Time Video Content Creator to join realistisch.ai and support us in producing high-quality social media content on a daily basis.

We operate fully remote and leverage modern AI tools to create efficient, scalable, and visually compelling content.



Important for this role:

???? Full-time only – no part-time arrangements.

???? We do not produce traditional on-site video shoots.

???? You will receive scripts and develop your own scene ideas, created with AI tools and your editing expertise.

???? No prior AI experience required – we can teach you everything. Your editing skills and reliability are far more important.

???? You must speak perfect English.



Your Responsibilities



- Create engaging, platform-specific social media content (Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, YouTube Shorts, etc.)

- Transform written scripts into visual concepts and scenes

- Use AI tools to generate video sequences (AI avatars, AI scenes, motion tools, etc.) – full training provided

- Edit, cut, and refine content according to our brand guidelines

- Review, optimize, and finalize content for publishing

- Collaborate with our creative team to shape and evolve our content style

- Work independently and deliver consistent, high-quality results in a fully remote setup



About Us



realistisch.ai is a German company, and reliability is one of our core values.

We work with German clients who pay on time, allowing us to offer stable, secure, and well-paid full-time employment.



We help companies grow by creating impactful, AI-powered social media content that increases reach, leads, and customer engagement.

Our workflow is modern, structured, scalable — and fully remote.



What We Offer



Full-time employment only

- 100% remote work

- Stable employment with a reliable German company

- German clients who pay on time ? your salary is secure

- Competitive compensation

- Bi-weekly payments available if preferred

- Clear workflows and streamlined processes

- Full AI training and continuous upskilling

- Access to modern tools and the latest AI technology

- Long-term collaboration and development opportunities

- Room for creativity, ownership, and personal growth

- Hubstaff as our time & activity tracking software

- 20 days paid leave/ year





What We’re Looking For



- Experience in video editing, video production, or animation

(degree, apprenticeship, agency experience, or self-taught)

- Strong skills in Premiere Pro and/or After Effects

- Creativity, attention to detail, and understanding of social media trends

- Excellent English skills (spoken and written)

- High reliability, discipline, and ability to meet deadlines

- Ability to follow and improve existing processes

- Technical understanding of video, audio, lighting, and digital tools

- Willingness to learn AI tools (experience not required)



AI experience is a plus but NOT required.

Strong editing skills and reliability matter most.



If you want to help shape the future of AI-driven content creation and grow with us in a stable, long-term, full-time role, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Software Developer (API, n8n)
description:

About Us



realistisch.ai builds AI-powered content systems for German companies.

We rely heavily on n8n, 
, API integrations, and custom logic that supports our international production team.

What We Offer

- Bi-weekly payments available

- Opportunity to work with advanced AI processes

- Clear documentation, structured workflows, and supportive teams

Requirements

 (required)

If you’re passionate about automation and love building efficient systems that run at scale, we’d be excited to have you join our team.

title: Video Editor / Video Creator for Faceless YouTube Channel (Pets) – Long-Term
description:
Hi! We run a faceless YouTube channel about pets (mostly dogs/cats/puppies/kittens - and others) and we’re looking for a reliable video editor who can help us create 9–13 minute videos consistently. This is a long-term role if we work well together.



What you’ll be editing (primarily 2 video types)



1) Info / Story Videos

Your role:



Find and edit relevant, high-quality clips that match the script, voice-over, pacing, 

keywords, and storyline to create highly engaging and binge-worthy video content

(Example: Why Dogs Lick Your Face)

Add simple on-screen text when needed



2) Compilation Videos 

Examples: “Big Dog Fails,” “Cats Love Their Owners,” “Pets in Snow”

Your role:



Source clips that match the topic and edit into a cohesive, engaging 

compilation with strong flow and retention



General Editing Style (Important)



We care a lot about pacing and retention:



Avoid long static shots



Prefer clean cuts and jump cuts (minimal slow fades)



Keep visual energy high (pattern interrupts, zooms/pans when needed)





What we need from you:

Deliver final videos in 1080p (and 720p if requested)



Strong editing skills (cutting, pacing, audio syncing, basic enhancement, muting/adjusting audio, zoom/pan, etc.)



Ability to find/source clips responsibly 



Daily communication (quick update + questions + what you’ll work on next)



Bonus: If you already have subscriptions to stock footage sites with commercial licenses, mention them in your application.



How to apply (important)



To apply, include the word river at the top of your message.



Please also include:



Your YouTube editing experience (channels/niches)



2–5 samples of work (YouTube links or a portfolio link)



What editing software you use



Your typical turnaround time for a 9–13 minute video



Your minimum monthly or hourly rate for full-time 40 hours/week



Rate of pay: Between $340.00 to $550.00/month

We will determine pay rate based on experience and quality of work when hiring. 

There will also be the opportunity for bonuses after 120 days, based on the quality of your work, and how well 

the YT channel performs based on your contributions, and raises as your production and quality warrants.



Thanks — excited to see your work!



If selected, we’ll start with a paid test to make sure we’re a good fit together. That is how we

will determine the final hire.

title: Affiliate Manager (Remote – Full Time)
description:
We are a fast-growing international e-commerce brand in the professional beauty and grooming space. We sell premium tools used by hairdressers, barbers, educators, and professionals worldwide. We are now building a structured affiliate program to scale globally.



This role is for someone who knows how to recruit, manage, and grow affiliates. This is not a passive role where affiliates are signed up and ignored. We are looking for someone who treats affiliates as a real revenue channel.



What You’ll Be Doing



Affiliate Recruitment



1 - Find and recruit creators, educators, barbers, hairdressers, and influencers

2 - Conduct outreach via Instagram, TikTok, YouTube,
, and direct messages

3 - Onboard affiliates with tracking links, discount codes, and clear guidelines



Affiliate Management



1 - Keep affiliates active, informed, and motivated

2 - Share product launches, promotions, bundles, and key talking points

3 - Answer questions and provide day-to-day affiliate support



Performance and Optimisation



1 - Track affiliate performance including sales, AOV, and conversions

2 - Identify top-performing affiliates and scale those relationships

3 - Remove or clean up inactive or low-quality affiliates



Content and Brand Alignment



1 - Help affiliates understand how to communicate product value correctly

2 - Suggest content ideas such as demos, tutorials, and education-based angles

3 - Ensure brand positioning stays premium and not discount-driven or spammy



What We’re Looking For



Required



1 - Experience managing or supporting affiliate programs

2 - Comfortable working with Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube creators

3 - Strong written English communication skills

4 - Organised, proactive, and performance-focused mindset

5 - Familiarity with affiliate platforms such as Refersion, UpPromote, ShareASale, or GoAffPro



Nice to Have



1 - Experience in beauty, barber, fashion, or fitness industries

2 - Influencer or creator outreach experience

3 - Basic reporting or spreadsheet skills

4 - Understanding of e-commerce metrics such as AOV, CPA, and ROAS



Why This Role Is Different



1 - You will not be micromanaged

2 - You will have real ownership of the affiliate channel

3 - Clear growth opportunities as the program scales

4 - Long-term role with a growing global brand



How to Apply



Please include the following:



1 - A short introduction about your affiliate experience

2 - Examples of affiliate programs or creators you have worked with

3 - How you would recruit your first 20 affiliates for a new brand



Applications without affiliate experience will not be considered.

title: AI Automation Specialist – Clawd Bot Setup & Cloud Deployment
description:

title: Virtual Assistant
description:
About Stellata Partners

Stellata Partners is a private investment firm focused on middle-market investment opportunities in the United States. Stellata Partners is run by an alumnus from Harvard Business School with experience in investment banking and private equity across a variety of industries. We operate in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment and work closely with leadership day-to-day.



Role Overview

We’re hiring a Virtual Assistant (VA) to support proprietary deal sourcing efforts and general administrative needs. You’ll be a key execution partner for:

• Lead generation and list building for outbound campaigns

• Contact enrichment and data hygiene

• Cold calling and follow-up

• General VA operations support (scheduling, research, light admin)



You’ll work directly with the Founder/Managing Partner and help keep the sourcing engine running smoothly.



Key Responsibilities

1) Proprietary Sourcing Support (Primary)

• Build targeted lead lists (companies and decision-makers) aligned to investment criteria

• Enrich contacts (titles,
s, LinkedIn, phone numbers), validate deliverability signals, and maintain clean datasets

• Support outbound
 campaign preparation (segmentation, personalization variables, list QA, bounce management coordination)

• Manage and update a CRM (customer relationship management) and sourcing trackers (pipeline stages, notes, next steps)

• Research companies quickly and accurately (industry, ownership clues, location footprint, basic diligence signals)



2) Cold Calling + Follow-Up (Primary)

• Place outbound calls to business owners and executives using provided scripts and talk tracks

• Qualify leads and capture structured notes (business profile, ownership intent, timing, objections)

• Route interested prospects to the next step (calendar scheduling, intro
, information request)

• Maintain high professionalism and compliance with calling best practices and internal guidelines



3) General Virtual Assistant Support (Secondary)

• Inbox triage support (labeling, routing, drafting basic replies for review)

• Scheduling and coordination (calls, reminders, follow-up cadences)

• Light operations tasks and ad hoc projects to keep workflows organized



Qualifications

• Prior experience in sourcing, outreach, or pipeline/CRM support, ideally supporting a search fund or investment firm workflow

• Demonstrated experience with lead generation, list building, and contact enrichment for outbound campaigns

• Familiarity with tools such as LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Apollo, Seamless.ai, ZoomInfo, Hunter, Clay, Grata, SourceScrub, Instantly/Smartlead, 
, HubSpot, Pipedrive, or Airtable

• Microsoft Excel and Outlook proficiency

• Comfortable making cold calls to U.S. business owners and handling objections with professionalism

• Strong attention to detail and high quality standards in data work

• Highly organized and reliable with deadlines, task tracking, and follow-through

• Excellent spoken and written English (fluency required)



What We Are Looking For 

• Comfort working in a dynamic, entrepreneurial environment 

• Proactive mindset and initiative-taking attitude 

• Ability to learn quickly and take feedback 

• Consistent high-quality performance and keen attention to detail 

• Strong analytical, research, and communication capabilities 



Schedule: Part-time or full-time (based on fit); ability to overlap with U.S. Central Time (CT) is a plus



Note: In your message, please include a list of all lead generation/sourcing tools and databases that you 1) currently have access to and 2) do not have access to but have experience using in prior roles. Also please state in the message your prior relevant experience working with search funds, private equity firms, or other investment firms in deal sourcing roles.

title: WordPress Maintenance & Support Developer
description:
About Field Nine Group

Field Nine Group is a portfolio company specializing in strategic communications, digital media, design, and SaaS products. We work with newsrooms, media companies, nonprofits, and mission-driven organizations across the United States. Our clients rely on us for high-quality digital strategy and hands-on technical support to keep their platforms running smoothly.



About the Role

We are looking for a reliable, detail-oriented WordPress developer to join our team as a maintenance and support specialist. This is a hands-on role focused on day-to-day website upkeep, minor updates, bug fixes, and client-facing technical support across multiple web properties.



This is not a site-build role. We have a separate development team that handles full builds. This position is specifically for maintaining and supporting existing WordPress sites, keeping them updated, and ensuring our clients’ needs are met quickly and professionally.



You will also serve as the primary technical support contact for one of our key media clients, meaning you must be comfortable communicating directly with clients via phone when urgent issues arise. Strong English and customer service skills are mandatory.



Core Responsibilities

Website Maintenance & Updates

Perform routine WordPress updates including plugins, themes, and content changes across multiple sites

Update links, images, text, and page layouts as requested

Troubleshoot and resolve minor bugs, display issues, and plugin conflicts

Ensure sites are functioning properly and loading correctly across devices

Work through a task queue managed in Asana on an ongoing basis



Client Technical Support

Serve as the dedicated technical support contact for a U.S.-based media client

Be available and responsive during U.S. Eastern Time business hours (9 AM – 6 PM ET)

Communicate directly with the client’s team via phone for urgent issues

Diagnose and resolve issues including newsletter HTML errors, widget display problems, form malfunctions, and content publishing issues

Provide clear, professional communication to non-technical stakeholders



On-Call Availability ( Paid Extra)

Opportunity to earn additional compensation by joining our on-call support rotation

On-call hours cover evenings and weekends (U.S. Eastern Time) for emergency situations

Emergencies are defined as site-down events, security issues, or anything preventing content publishing

Expected to respond within 1 hour during on-call shifts

On-call compensation is provided on top of base pay



Required Skills & Qualifications

3+ years of hands-on experience with WordPress (theme customization, plugin management, troubleshooting)

Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and basic PHP as it relates to WordPress

Experience troubleshooting common WordPress issues (plugin conflicts, display bugs, broken forms,
 delivery)

Comfortable communicating in English — both written and verbal — with U.S.-based clients

Available to work during U.S. Eastern Time business hours (9 AM – 6 PM ET)

Reliable internet connection and a professional remote work setup

Experience using project management tools (Notion preferred)

Responsive and communicative — you check messages regularly and don’t disappear



Nice to Have

Familiarity with Newspack (WordPress-based CMS for news organizations)

Experience with WooCommerce, Gravity Forms, or membership/subscription plugins

Basic understanding of DNS, domain management, and
 configuration

Experience working with U.S. clients or media/news organizations

Comfort with WhatsApp Business for client communication



What We Offer

Competitive monthly compensation of $1,000 – $1,200 USD

Additional pay for on-call hours

Long-term, stable engagement — this is an ongoing role, not a one-off project

Consistent, manageable workload with clear task management through Notion

Opportunity to grow with a fast-scaling company working with high-profile U.S. media and nonprofit clients

Supportive team environment with clear communication and expectations



How to Apply

Please submit the following:

Your resume or portfolio highlighting WordPress maintenance and support experience

A brief message (3–5 sentences) explaining why you’re a good fit for this role

Your availability to start and your current timezone

Examples of WordPress sites you have maintained (not just built)



We are looking to fill this role quickly. Qualified candidates may be contacted for a brief video interview within 24–48 hours of applying.

title: Account Manager - Tax and Accounting Firm
description:
Breadcounter is a modern financial agency built for internet businesses. We help founders save money, scale fast, and eventually exit their companies.



We run like an agency. Clarity, speed, and systems matter.



We’re hiring an account manager who owns the client experience end-to-end and acts as the bridge between clients, accounting, and tax strategy. You are the day-to-day owner of client relationships after a deal is closed.



You are not doing bookkeeping or tax prep.

You are financially literate enough to understand and explain numbers, anticipate questions, and route issues correctly.



This role is ideal for someone who understands how accounting works, even if they are not an accountant.



What You’ll Own:



- Primary point of contact for a portfolio of clients

- Client onboarding and clean handoffs from sales

- Ongoing communication, expectations, and follow-ups

- Explaining financial reports at a high level (P&L, balance sheet, cashflow, etc)

- Answering basic accounting questions and escalating complex ones

- Routing tax strategy questions to the EA/CPA

- Enforcing scope and SLAs

- Tracking deliverables, deadlines, and client requests

- Keeping CRM and client records clean

- Flagging risks, opportunities, and upgrade signals



You’ll do well here if you:



- Have experience in an agency, consultancy, or services business

- Have managed and grown a portfolio of clients

- Understand financial statements and basic accounting principles

- Can confidently explain numbers without “winging it”

- Are organized, calm, and decisive

- Take ownership and communicate clearly

- Enjoy working with founders and operators





This role is not a fit if you:



- Avoid client-facing responsibility

- Prefer loose structure

- Need step-by-step direction



Requirements:



- Strong written and spoken English

- Financial literacy (P&L, balance sheet, basic accounting concepts)

- Client success, account management, or ops experience

- Comfort working with US-based clients



Agency, SaaS, or accounting-adjacent background preferred.



To apply, please submit a Loom video up to 5 minutes covering the following:



- Your name, where you are based, and your current or most recent role

- Why Breadcounter stood out to you and why this Client Operations Lead role makes sense for you

- Your experience managing a portfolio of clients, including the types of clients, how many you managed at once, and your role as the main point of contact

- A brief explanation of the difference between revenue, profit, and cash flow as if you were explaining it to a non-financial founder

- An example of a time a client was unhappy or confused and how you handled the situation



Applications without a Loom video will not be considered.

title: Motion Designer & Video Editor (Full-Time)
description:
Field Nine Group LLC is hiring a full-time Motion Designer & Video Editor to join our creative team.



We're a strategic communications and media consulting company working with newsrooms, foundations, and brands on social video strategy, creator partnerships, and editorial content. Our work spans fast-turnaround social content (reels, short-form video) and longer editorial pieces for journalism and nonprofit clients.

title: AI Short-Form Video Editor – Face Transformation
description:

title: Professional YouTube Video Editor

Compensation: Competitive, based on experience and quality

Contract Type: Long-term collaboration



???? Channel Overview



I run a teaching-focused YouTube channel centered on clear explanations, structured delivery, and strong viewer retention. The content is educational and commentary-based, prioritizing clarity, pacing, and professionalism over flashy or excessive effects.



I am seeking a reliable, skilled editor who understands YouTube best practices and can consistently deliver high-quality long-form edits.



EXAMPLE OF VIDEO

title: YouTube Video Editor
description:

Channel Type: Teaching / Educational / Commentary

Pay: Competitive (based on experience & quality)



???? About the Channel



I run a teaching-focused YouTube channel where I break down concepts clearly and directly. The goal is clarity, pacing, and retention, not over-the-top edits. I’m looking for a high-quality editor who understands how to make educational content engaging without being distracting.

? Ideal Editor

2–3 examples of similar YouTube edits

If the quality is there, this can expand into:



More weekly uploads



Short-form edits



Higher pay over time

title: Reservationist / Customer Support Specialist (Level I & Level II)
description:
Job Title: Reservationist / Customer Support Specialist (Level I & Level II)



Department: Reservations & Guest Experience

Employment Type: Full-Time

Location: Remote / Hybrid (based on role and experience)



We are seeking detail-oriented, service-driven Reservationists / Customer Support Specialists to join our growing hospitality operations team. This role sits at the center of guest experience and booking operations, supporting travelers, corporate clients, and property partners across multiple channels.



We are hiring for both Level I and Level II roles, depending on experience and demonstrated capability.



Minimum Requirement (All Candidates):

-Bachelor’s degree in Hospitality Management or a closely related field.



Level I – Reservationist / Customer Support Specialist



This role is ideal for early-career hospitality professionals who excel at customer interaction and operational execution.



Responsibilities:



-Handle inbound and outbound guest communications via phone,
, and chat



-Assist with reservations, modifications, cancellations, and general inquiries



-Provide accurate information regarding properties, amenities, policies, and stay details



-Document guest interactions clearly and consistently in CRM and ticketing systems



-Escalate complex issues to Level II support when appropriate



-Maintain a high standard of professionalism, empathy, and response time



Qualifications:



-Bachelor’s degree in Hospitality Management (required)



-2–4 years of experience in hospitality, reservations, hotels, or customer support



-Strong verbal and written communication skills



-High attention to detail and comfort working in fast-paced environments



-Familiarity with reservation systems, PMS tools, or CRM platforms is a plus



Level II – Senior Reservationist / Customer Support Specialist



This role is designed for experienced hospitality professionals capable of handling escalations, complex bookings, and operational problem-solving.



Responsibilities:



-Manage complex reservations, corporate bookings, and multi-property stays



-Resolve escalated guest and partner issues with professionalism and urgency



-Act as a subject-matter expert on policies, workflows, and systems



-Coordinate with internal teams (operations, revenue, partnerships) to resolve issues



-Identify recurring issues and recommend process improvements



-Support training and mentoring of Level I tea
mbers



Qualifications:



-Bachelor’s degree in Hospitality Management (required)



-3+ years of experience in reservations, hotel operations, or advanced customer support



-Strong problem-solving and conflict-resolution skills



-Experience with PMS, channel managers, OTAs, or corporate travel platforms preferred



-Ability to work independently and make sound judgment calls



What We Offer:



Competitive compensation based on level and experience



Growth opportunities within a rapidly scaling hospitality platform



Collaborative, performance-driven team environment



Exposure to corporate travel, short-term rentals, and multi-channel booking operations



If you’re passionate about hospitality, guest experience, and operational excellence—and you hold a degree in Hospitality Management—we’d love to hear from you.

title: Senior Video Editor & Social Media VA
description:
We are a VA Agency hiring an experienced, self-sufficient Video Editor and Virtual Assistant with a strong focus on short-form video, podcast and YouTube videos.



This is a senior-level role requiring proven expertise, independent execution, and a high standard of creative output.



This role is ideal for someone experienced, creative, and detail-driven, who knows how to produce scroll-stopping content and support social media execution end-to-end.



Core Responsibilities



• Edit high-quality short-form and long form videos

• Create professional thumbnails and visual assets

• Support social media content execution and optimisation

• Apply trends, strong hooks, captions, and pacing

• Collaborate with a team and report on progress



Requirements



• Proven experience in short and long form video editing

• Strong understanding of different platforms strategy and trends

• Graphic design skills (thumbnails and visuals)

• Social media VA experience

• CapCut and other platform experience preferred

• High attention to detail; reliable and deadline-driven



Ideal Candidate:

To apply: Please include examples of your video editing work, thumbnails, and relevant social media experience.

title: HR Recruitment Assistant Manager - Mandarin-speaking preferred - (Full-Time)
description:

We are rapidly expanding and seeking a highly organized Virtual HR Assistant / Recruiting Assistant to support our day-to-day hiring operations.

Screen resumes and shortlist qualified candidates

Schedule and conduct initial phone/Zoom interviews

Assist with onboarding tasks and document collection

Coordinate with candidates regarding schedules, requirements, and next steps

Maintain candidate information in Airtable or CRM

Prepare simple reports and updates

Support the CEO with daily administrative and HR tasks



Ideal Candidate

Hardworking

Show up on time

Reliable

Strong English communication skills (Mandarin a plus but not required)

Previous HR, recruiting, admin, or virtual assistant experience preferred

Highly organized, reliable, and comfortable working independently

Able to multitask and manage fast-changing priorities

Familiar with Indeed, Calendly, Zoom, Airtable, Canva, or willing to learn

Professional, positive attitude and strong people skills



 Schedule & Pay: Weekly + Bonus $500 for each successful placement.

title: Executive Assistant to Founder
description:
Why Athletic Ventures



Athletic Ventures (AV) is a world-first venture capital firm backing elite athletes as founders, operators, and investors. We partner with exceptional people early, help them build enduring businesses, and take a long-term view on value creation.



This role is for someone who wants real responsibility, real trust, and real impact. You’ll work directly with Matt De Boer, supporting a founder who is building something genuinely different in the global venture ecosystem. AV is a small, high-leverage team — which means autonomy is high, context is deep, and your work will materially shape how the firm operates and scales.



What this role offers:

• A diverse role with significant autonomy and ownership

• Direct partnership with the founder of a world-first VC firm

• The chance to work with a small team and have outsized impact

• Strong future growth opportunities as AV scales

• Fully remote work with a high degree of flexibility



About the Role

This is a high-trust, high-autonomy executive assistant role supporting a founder. Your job is to reduce cognitive load, create order, and help the founder operate at his best.



Executive Support

• Manage calendar, meetings, scheduling, and time-blocking

• Coordinate travel, logistics, and itineraries

• Draft and edit documents,
s, and presentations

• Prepare briefs and background research

• Track follow-ups and ensure closure



Operational & Personal Effectiveness

• Support personal and life-admin tasks

• Maintain systems for priorities and tasks

• Streamline recurring processes

• Create clarity from ambiguity



General Executive Operations

• Handle sensitive information with confidentiality

• Anticipate needs and flag issues early

• Build templates and trackers

• Act as a trusted thought partner



About You

We’re looking for an organized, task-driven and motivated all-rounder who wants to work with a high performing Australian business and founder.  There are certain must haves, and some nice to haves.  



Must Have:

• Exceptional organisation and prioritisation

• Strong written and spoken English

• High discretion and emotional intelligence

• Bias toward action

• Strong problem-solving skills



Nice-to-Have

• Founder or CEO support experience

• VC or startup exposure

• Project coordination experience



What Success Looks Like

• Founder spends more time on high-impact work

• Calendar and communications run smoothly

• Problems are solved before they escalate



What’s in It for You

This is a role that offers unique exposure to a world class founder with the ability to build a career in executive support.  



Beyond that, AV offers:

• Direct partnership with the founder of a world-first VC firm

• The chance to work with a small team and have outsized impact

• Strong future growth opportunities as AV scales

• Fully remote work with a high degree of flexibility



To apply please include the link to your resume or attach the file to your application.

title: Python / Javascript Developer (3+ Years Experience) WFH
description:
We are seeking an experienced Python developer with JavaScript experience to bring their experience, knowledge, and passion for building great features and code to our team.



Are you looking for:

1. A long-term, work-from-home role with great pay and benefits?

2. Daytime working hours (6 AM - 2 PM, Monday to Friday, PH Time)?

3. Challenging projects with opportunities to learn and grow?

4. An environment that values doing things the "right" way, rather than taking shortcuts?

5. A friendly, supportive team dedicated to delivering new projects and features?



If so, we'd love to hear from you!



About Us

MachShip is an Australian-based company disrupting the freight industry with our cloud-based Freight Management System. Our software team comprises over 30 Australian and Filipino engineers, and we're expanding our integrations department.



The Role

The MachShip integrations department is responsible for integrating client platforms and new carriers with the MachShip cloud platform.



We are currently looking for developers to help us build new integrations in our new in-house workflow engine in Python, with some Javascript. As a developer in the integrations team, your job will be to:



- Transition our existing integrations across to our new in-house UI workflow engine

- The creation of new carrier integrations

- Create and maintain advanced workflows using our UI workflow engine

- Write rules, scripts and mapping in Python and Javascript

- Script and optimize complex data flows between systems

- Work with and manipulate data of all types from JSON, XML, CSV, and more

- Work on new platform integrations and supporting existing ones



As a developer at MachShip, you will:

- Join an agile, innovative team with daily stand-ups and fortnightly sprints

- Develop your skills working on complex data flows, workflows, and integrations

- Collaborate with top-tier developers in a culture that values diverse opinions

- Receive support for personal and professional growth through monthly one-on-ones

- Have the opportunity to share ideas and contribute to the development process



Required Skills & Experience:

- Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, or related field

- Minimum 3 years of Python/JavaScript experience (at least 3 projects)

- Experience using AI assistants while coding, like Copilot

- Experience with various APIs, including REST and OAuth

- Proficiency in Git and code management

- Unit Testing Experience

- Strong logic, database design, and analytical skills

- Good English comprehension and communication skills



The applicant we are looking for is:

- A hard-working problem-solver with strong analytical skills

- An independent thinker who keeps end-users in mind

- Comfortable communicating via Slack or Teams

- Seeking a long-term role with excellent benefits



Application Process

1. Fill out our job application form (password: "developer") : 
/dev-application/

2. Qualified candidates will be invited to complete a short phone interview



Note: Applications will be screened based on suitable experience and the contents of your cover letter. Applicants should ensure their cover letter summarizes how their project experience, integration skills, and personality match the requirements outlined.



We look forward to hearing from passionate developers ready to contribute to our team!

title: Social Media VA – Instagram Growth & Viral Content
description:
Social Media VA – Instagram Growth & Viral Content (Motivational / Entrepreneurial Brand):



We are looking for a Social Media Virtual Assistant to help grow the Instagram presence of our brand OWNRSHP.

OWNRSHP represents ownership, discipline, ambition, and self-belief. Our goal is to build a powerful Instagram page by consistently posting motivational, inspiring, and viral short-form video content that aligns with our brand values.

This role is not just about posting - it’s about finding high-potential viral content, clipping it correctly, and helping grow an engaged following.



Main Responsibilities

- Find viral or high-potential motivational / inspirational videos (Reels, TikToks, YouTube clips, podcasts, speeches, etc.)

- Clip and format videos into Instagram Reels (9:16 vertical)

- Ensure clips align with the OWNRSHP brand message (ownership, mindset, success, discipline)

- Either: Post the videos directly to our Instagram account OR Send the clipped videos to us for final editing/posting

- Ensure each video leaves space for or includes our OWNRSHP logo at the end

- Follow simple posting guidelines (captions, hashtags, timing)

- Maintain consistency and quality over quantity





Primary Goal:

- Grow Instagram followers through motivational, viral short-form content.





What We’re Looking For:

Skills:

- Good Understanding of Instagram Reels & viral short-form content

- Ability to spot viral potential (hooks, emotion, relatability)

- Basic video clipping/editing skills (CapCut, Premiere Pro, VN, etc.)

- Good English comprehension

- Attention to detail

- Reliable internet connection

- Consistent and dependable



Preferred (but not required):

- Experience growing Instagram or TikTok pages

- Familiarity with motivational / entrepreneurship content

- Understanding of branding & aesthetics





Work Style & Expectations

- This is a long-term role if performance is strong

- Clear instructions, examples, and brand guidelines will be provided

- Communication via WhatsApp / Microsoft Teams

- Quality and consistency matter more than volume





Compensation

- Hourly or per-video pay (to be discussed based on experience)

- Opportunities for pay increases based on performance and growth results





How to Apply (IMPORTANT)

To apply, please follow these instructions carefully:



**Message or
 with Subject Line:

1.  Your First & Last Name – OWNRSHP Social Media VA

2. Start your application with the word: OWN

3. Include: 

- Your resume

- Links to your portfolio or any Instagram/TikTok pages you’ve worked on (if available)



You can either message us here or email us at: company.motive@gmail.com



Applicants who do not follow these instructions will not be considered. Once your application has been reviewed, we will arrange a Microsoft Teams/Whatsapp chat.

title: AI Product Graphic Designer (E-commerce)
description:
We are looking for a part-time AI Product Graphic Designer who can create high-quality product visuals based on existing images.



This is an execution-focused role. You will work from provided product photos and clear instructions to create realistic, clean and conversion-focused visuals where product features are clearly visible. This role is not about branding or creative concepting.



Responsibilities



Creating product images based on existing photos using AI and design tools



Enhancing product visuals while maintaining a natural, realistic look



Making product features and details clearly visible



Improving image flow, lighting and composition where needed



Following detailed instructions to achieve consistent results



Delivering images suitable for product pages, ads and marketplaces



Working efficiently while maintaining high visual quality



Requirements



Proven experience as a graphic designer for e-commerce or product visuals



Strong experience with AI-based image tools (e.g. generative fill, AI image editing)



Strong skills in Adobe Photoshop (required)



Ability to work with existing images rather than creating concepts from scratch



Good eye for realism, product detail and clean presentation



Able to follow precise instructions without unnecessary creative changes



Experience with AI tools such as Midjourney, DALL·E, Firefly or similar is a strong plus



Compensation



Compensation is based on output (number of images delivered)



We produce and test a high volume of product visuals



Once accepted and quality standards are met, there will be consistent ongoing work



With steady output, this results in a stable and competitive income



Not a fit if



You focus mainly on branding, logos or creative concepting



You prefer artistic freedom over execution based on instructions



You only work on social or illustrative designs



Application Instructions



Start your application message with the word Apple and briefly mention your experience with AI image tools and product-focused graphic design.

Applications that do not follow this instruction will be ignored.

title: Short-Form Content Architect (OpusClip & CapCut) - $4/hr
description:
H2 Digital is an elite systems agency. We install "Revenue Infrastructure" for world-class Sales Trainers and Leadership Coaches. We are looking for a creative, detail-oriented Video Editor to run our "Content Waterfall" system.



You will be responsible for taking raw long-form footage (webinars/podcasts) and transforming it into a high-authority, 5-platform social media presence.



The Mission:

• Identify: Use AI tools like OpusClip to identify the most viral, high-value "Hooks" and segments from long-form videos.

• Edit: Polish these clips in CapCut (Desktop) using 2026-style clean captions, B-roll, and brand-specific color grading.

• Optimize: Understand the pacing and psychology of different platforms (TikTok vs. LinkedIn vs. IG Reels).

• Schedule: Organize and upload finalized assets into our CRM (GoHighLevel) for distribution.

Requirements:

• Native-Level Understanding of English: You must be able to listen to a complex business training and identify exactly where the "Value" is.

• Proficiency in CapCut: Must be fast and creative with transitions and text animations.

• Tool Knowledge: Experience with OpusClip, Munch, or similar AI-slicing tools is a major plus.

• Aesthetic Eye: Our clients are "Elite" thought leaders. The content must look clean, expensive, and authoritative.

• Speed: Ability to turn 1 long-form video into 20 high-quality shorts within 48 hours.



Pay:

$2-4.00 USD per hour. Full-time (40 hours/week) or Part-time available.



How to Apply:

1. Send a link to your portfolio or 3 examples of short-form clips you have edited (specifically for coaches or business trainers).

2. Which AI tools do you currently use to speed up your editing workflow?

3. IMPORTANT: If you have read this entire post, you MUST put the word "WATERFALL" in your subject line, or your application will be ignored.

I look forward to seeing your work.

title: Senior Structural Engineer/CAD drafter
description:
Premium Australian BPO is seeking an experienced senior structural engineer with structural CAD drafting/ structural detailing capabilities for our client- an Australian company that specializes in engineering steel structures for residential/commercial projects and equipment/machinery for industrial/mining projects. 



This Full-Time (FT) role offers the flexibility of working-from-home (WFH), a market leading salary and paid leave. Be a key player on a supportive team of engineers and fast-track your professional growth into the Australian market. 



This client is a market leader in designing, detailing, fabricating and installing steel structures and architectural steel details for projects across residential, commercial and industrial scopes. Key areas of specialization include high-quality modular and steel-framed residential homes. Other key area's of specialization include Mining Equipment as an Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) designing and manufacturing machinery or machine parts use specifically in mining operations. 



****Key Responsibilities Include ****

- Delivering high-quality structural engineering services across various residential and industrial/mining projects. 

- Detailed structural design, analysis and documentation of steel structures- in compliance with relevant Australian codes and standards. 

- Performing analysis and design using tools Strand7, SpaceGass or similar software. 

- Developing and validating structural systems and load paths. 

- Reviewing and approving engineering calculations. 

- Reviewing drawings and models for engineering accuracy and compliance. 



CAD Drafting/ Structural Detailing Responsibilities Include

- Converting architectural drawings into high-quality detailed drawings for the entire life-cycle of the project including;

- Structural drawings.

- Shop drawings. 

- Fabrication drawings. 

- Erection drawings. 

- Perform accurate structural calculations

- Use tools AutoCAD and Tekla Structures to create 2D drawings and 3D models for steel structures. 

- Perform structural calculations. 

- Implement mark-ups and revisions from broader engineering team accurately. 



***Requirements to Apply***

- Degree/background in structural engineering or civil engineering, majoring in structural engineering. 

- Strong experience with structural steel analysis and design. 

- Proficiency with tools Strand7, Spacegass or similar analysis software. 

- Strong experience with steel CAD drafting/detailing. 

- High level of proficiency with AutoCAD. 

- Proficiency with Tekla Structures or similar modeling software. 

- 5+ years of professional experience. (Senior Level). 

- High level of proficiency in English both verbal and written. 



**** IDEAL candidates have****

- Previous experience working with Australian clients (Highly Preferred). 

- Familiarity with current Australian codes and standards (Highly Preferred). 

- Previous experience working with modular and steel-framed residential/commercial structures (Highly Preferred). 

- Previous experience working with Industrial/Mining Equipment, OEM (Highly Preferred). 



****WFH Requirements****



This role requires candidates have a complete WFH set-up in place including. 

- Laptop

- Monitor

- Fast and Reliable Internet

- Back-up internet options

- Back-up power options 

All software tools required for this role will be provided. 



Please link CVs and Portfolio's of sample works to be considered. 

Thank you!

title: Ebay/Depop/Poshmark lister
description:
Hello,



We need an assistant that can create listings for us. We will take the pictures of our items: upload them to google drive: and you will take those pictures and create a high quality cross-listing on Ebay, Depop, Poshmark. You need to be able to research items and come up with prices and be very good at pricing accurately and comparable to how other items have sold on Ebay sold listings. 



We sell mostly clothes but also electronics and books. We want an effective communicator that can create high quality listings. Experience in listings is wanted. We want to get at least 10 listings done an hour with bonuses for great performance. Bonuses will be given if you can do closer to 15 listings/hr. We start at 3 dollars an hour, will pay a bit more to excellent workers. Part time to start. 



Please respond with your experience and tell us about yourself. Please title your response with "batman" so I know you read this and are not spamming. One benefit to this job is you can choose your hours most of the time. It's ok to work at different times in the day. 



We will do 3-4 test listings, webcam interview/review to test for hiring. Thank you and have a blessed day.

title: Right-Hand Integrator / Operations Manager and Project Lead
description:
Part-Time | 10–20 hrs/week | PST Overlap Required

Remote | 1–2 weekly meetings

$6–$8 USD/hour (DOE)



About Wild Woman Herbal Apothecary



Wild Woman Herbal Apothecary is a California-based herbal wellness brand rooted in nature, intuition, and ancient plant wisdom.



We handcraft teas, tinctures, and self-care rituals that support women through every season of life — fro
nstrual health to postpartum care to emotional and nervous system support.



Our mission is to make everyday healing simple, beautiful, and natural.



Wild Woman is entering a critical phase of growth and stabilization. The Founder holds the vision, product direction, and brand strategy. What’s needed now is a grounded, reliable integrator who can own execution, track moving parts, and keep projects flowing forward without constant oversight.







About the Role



This is a high-ownership Operations Manager / Integrator role for someone who loves systems, clarity, and follow-through.



You’ll serve as the operational heartbeat of the business — translating existing priorities into action, coordinating the team, and ensuring projects move to completion without bottlenecking at the Founder.



This is not a basic admin or VA role.

This is not a strategy, apprenticeship, or emotional support position.



This role exists to:

	•	Remove operational and project-management burden from the Founder

	•	Ensure projects move forward steadily and completely

	•	Create clarity, structure, and accountability across the team

	•	Protect the Founder’s time, energy, and nervous system



If you enjoy turning vision into reality and thrive in a supportive, values-driven environment, this role may be a great fit.







What You’ll Do



You are the execution lead — ensuring work gets done, done well, and done on time.



1. Project & Priority Management

	•	Maintain the master list of active projects and priorities

	•	Break projects into clear tasks, timelines, and owners

	•	Manage workflows for:

	•	Product listing images & descriptions (Faire + website)

	•	Website build and content transfer

	•	Product launches (e.g. pregnancy/postpartum collection)

	•	Own ClickUp task hygiene: statuses, deadlines, dependencies

	•	Flag bottlenecks early and propose solutions

	•	Ensure work is polished before reaching the Founder for final approval



2. Team Coordination & Communication

	•	Coordinate with design, marketing, wholesale, and production support

	•	Clarify expectations and next steps without chasing or micromanaging

	•	Serve as the primary point of coordination so the Founder is not the default hub

	•	Run light, focused weekly team check-ins

	•	Prepare concise weekly summaries:

	•	What’s done

	•	What’s in progress

	•	What needs attention or decisions



3. Operations & Systems

	•	Own ClickUp organization and ongoing maintenance

	•	Create and document simple SOPs as workflows stabilize

	•	Track deadlines, handoffs, and dependencies

	•	Support production timelines and fulfillment flow

	•	Track inventory needs and supply ordering during busy seasons



4. Wholesale & Sales Support

	•	Review CRM activity weekly

	•	Ensure leads move through the pipeline

	•	Support follow-ups, samples, and coordination with wholesale partners



5. Brand & Quality Stewardship

	•	Ensure assets, documents, and processes align with the Wild Woman tone

	•	Support the flow of product content (catalogs, PK sheets, PL images)

	•	Double-check work for polish, clarity, and completeness



Founder Support (High Trust, Low Touch)

	•	Operate independently within clearly defined priorities

	•	Bring solutions, not just questions

	•	Protect the Founder from unnecessary meetings, noise, and task switching







Who You Are



You are likely a great fit if you are:

	•	Calm, grounded, and emotionally regulated under pressure

	•	Highly organized and detail-oriented

	•	Proactive — you notice what needs doing and do it

	•	Clear, respectful, and concise in communication

	•	Energized by finishing things, not just starting them

	•	Comfortable holding multiple moving projects at once

	•	Proud to work at a high standard without needing micromanagement



Experience that translates well:

	•	Operations, project management, or integrator roles

	•	Agency, studio, or small creative businesses

	•	Wellness, product-based, or e-commerce brands







Experience

	•	2–5 years in operations, project management, or team coordination

	•	Comfortable using ClickUp, Asana, Notion, or similar tools

	•	Familiar with Google Workspace

	•	Able to overlap with PST for at least 2–4 hours/day







Bonus Points If You:

	•	Have worked with women-led or wellness brands

	•	Understand Shopify, Faire, or small-batch e-commerce

	•	Are familiar with the Visionary + Integrator (EOS) model







Success Looks Like



After 30–60 days:

	•	Projects move forward without Founder intervention

	•	Tasks are clearly scoped, assigned, and tracked

	•	The team feels supported and accountable

	•	Systems are documented and repeatable

	•	The Founder has more space for creative leadership







What It Feels Like to Work Here



Wild Woman values softness and structure.

We believe clear systems create space for creativity, ritual, and rest.



This role holds the structure that makes that possible.







Hours & Compensation

	•	Hours: 10–20 hrs/week to start

	•	Rate: $6–$8 USD/hour (DOE, with growth opportunity)

	•	Start: As soon as the right fit is found

	•	Long-term: We’re looking for someone to grow with us ????







To Apply



Please send:

	1.	A short note on why this role speaks to you

	2.	2–3 examples of projects or systems you’ve managed

	3.	Your resume (optional: screenshots of tools/workflows)

title: Packaging Graphic Designer
description:
Job Summary:

We are a a young and dynamic growing E-commerce company focusing on baby and maternity products with customers based in the USA, Canada, and Europe. We are seeking a capable Packaging Graphic Designer to deliver positive results in packaging design. If you are looking for a challenging, rewarding, and fulfilling career, we welcome you to apply for the job below.



Key Responsibilities:

• Build packaging layouts on dielines (boxes, sleeves, labels, inserts, hang tags, stickers) using KeaBabies brand guidelines.

• Apply and format packaging content: approved copy, icons, benefit callouts, charts, barcodes/UPCs, product info, and required markings.

• Prepare print-ready files: correct bleed/safe zones, dieline alignment, CMYK setup, font handling (outline/package), linked images, and export specs.

• Create internal review mockups (clean 2D + simple 3D visuals) for quick approvals.

• Handle packaging updates and versioning quickly (pack count/size changes, language/copy updates, claim changes, retailer/Amazon variants, seasonal refreshes).

• Design occasional full-color packaging boxes for existing products (front/back/sides), keeping hierarchy clear and branding consistent.

• Maintain packaging templates and systems so new SKUs/variations stay consistent (type scale, grids, icon rules, layout logic).

• Organize and deliver final handoff packages to Product Development (clear file naming, folder structure, exports, and “final” version control).



Must-have requirements:

• Packaging design + production experience (consumer goods preferred), with ability to work from dielines.

• Strong understanding of print production basics:

1. bleed / safe zone / trim

2. CMYK vs RGB

3. exporting print-ready PDFs

4. font handling (outlining/packaging) + linked assets

• High attention to detail (typo-free, aligned layouts, consistent spacing, correct SKUs/info).

• Ability to execute both minimal / limited-ink e-commerce packaging, and full-color box designs for existing products when needed.

• Comfortable with fast iteration + versioning (counts, sizes, copy/claim updates, variants).

• Strong file hygiene: organized layers, naming conventions, clean exports, version control.

• Clear communication and ability to implement feedback quickly in  an async remote workflow.

• Capability to use the following tools:

1. Adobe Illustrator

2. Adobe Photoshop + Acrobat



Nice-to-have, but optional:

• Working knowledge of InDesign

• Experience with Amazon/e-commerce packaging constraints (clarity-first layouts, compliance callouts)



Portfolio requirements:

• Portfolio showing packaging work (ideally includes at least: - one minimal/limited-ink style layout, and - one full-color box design)



Additional Information:

• Title your message: "I want to be your next Packaging Graphic Designer"

• No moonlighting is allowed during work hours in this role.

title: AI Automation engineer & Full Stack  developer
description:
AI Automation Engineer & Full Stack Developer

Healthcare Technology

Company: Medical Centre Network (MEDCN) / Healthcare Innovation Division

Location: Remote 

Employment Type: Full-time Contract / Freelance



About Us

Medical Centre Network (MEDCN) operates three leading GP practices on Australia's Gold Coast and is at the forefront of healthcare technology innovation. We're developing cutting-edge AI-powered healthcare platforms that are transforming how healthcare is delivered and managed in Australia.

The Opportunity

We're seeking an exceptional AI Automation Engineer & Full Stack Developer to join our technology team and take ownership of building and maintaining our suite of AI-powered healthcare applications. This is a unique opportunity to work on meaningful healthcare technology that directly impacts patient care and medical practice efficiency.

Key Projects You'll Work On

• Instavitals - AI-powered telehealth platform with intelligent medical scribe capabilities that automates clinical documentation and streamlines virtual consultations

• HrDr - AI healthcare recruitment platform specifically designed for Australian GP workforce placement and medical practice staffing optimization

• VoxMed - Voice-enabled medical documentation and workflow automation system

• Practally - Practice management and operational efficiency platform for medical centres

Primary Responsibilities

Full Stack Development

• Design, develop, and maintain production-ready healthcare applications using React and Supabase

• Build responsive, intuitive user interfaces for both patients and healthcare providers

• Develop and optimize backend services, APIs, and database architectures

• Implement real-time features and data synchronization across platforms

• Ensure code quality, testing, and documentation standards

AI Automation Engineering

• Integrate and optimize AI/ML models for medical scribe, voice recognition, and clinical documentation

• Develop intelligent automation workflows for healthcare processes

• Implement natural language processing (NLP) for medical transcription and data extraction

• Build AI-powered features for recruitment matching and practice optimization

• Fine-tune and maintain AI models for healthcare-specific use cases

Security & Compliance

• Implement comprehensive security hardening measures

• Ensure compliance with healthcare data protection regulations (HIPAA-equivalent, Australian privacy laws)

• Develop secure authentication and authorization systems

• Conduct security audits and vulnerability assessments

Production Deployment & Maintenance

• Deploy applications to production environments

• Monitor system performance and optimize for scalability

• Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues promptly

• Implement CI/CD pipelines and automated testing

Required Technical Skills

Must Have:

• Frontend: Expert-level React.js, JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, modern UI frameworks

• Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage, Edge Functions), RESTful APIs

• AI/ML: Experience integrating AI APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, or similar), understanding of LLM implementations

• Version Control: Git, GitHub/GitLab workflows

• Development Tools: VS Code, npm/yarn, debugging tools

Highly Desirable:

• Experience with AI/ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face)

• Voice recognition and speech-to-text technologies

• Real-time communication systems (WebRTC)

• Healthcare software development experience

• Knowledge of medical terminology and clinical workflows

• Python for AI/automation scripts

• Mobile app development (React Native)

• AWS/Azure cloud platforms

• Docker and containerization

Required Experience & Qualifications

• Minimum 3-5 years full-stack development experience

• At least 1-2 years working with AI/ML integration or automation

• Proven track record of delivering production-ready applications

• Portfolio demonstrating complex web applications (healthcare projects a strong plus)

• Experience with healthcare or medical software is highly valued

• Strong problem-solving and analytical skills

• Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal)

• Self-motivated with ability to work independently and manage multiple projects

Ideal Candidate Profile

You're the perfect fit if you:

• Are passionate about using technology to improve healthcare

• Have a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development

• Are excited about AI and automation technologies

• Can translate complex requirements into elegant technical solutions

• Write clean, maintainable, well-documented code

• Stay current with emerging technologies and best practices

• Can work effectively in Australian business hours (overlap required)

• Have attention to detail and commitment to quality

What We Offer

• Work on meaningful healthcare technology with real-world impact

• Competitive compensation based on experience and skills

• Flexible remote work arrangement

• Opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI technologies

• Direct collaboration with medical professionals and healthcare leaders

• Professional development and learning opportunities

• Long-term career growth potential as we scale our platforms

• Supportive, innovation-focused work environment

Work Schedule

• Remote position with flexible hours

• Some overlap with Australian business hours (AEST/AEDT) required for team collaboration

• Full-time commitment (40 hours per week)

How to Apply

Please submit the following:

• Updated Resume/CV highlighting relevant experience

• Portfolio or GitHub profile showcasing your best work

• Cover letter addressing:

     - Your experience with healthcare applications (if any)

     - Your approach to AI integration in web applications

     - Why you're interested in healthcare technology

     - Your availability and expected compensation

• Code samples or links to live projects you've built (healthcare/AI projects preferred)



Expected Start Date: Immediate / As soon as possible

Questions?

For inquiries about this position, please include "Question - Developer Position" in your subject line.

We're excited to find the right person to join our team and help revolutionize healthcare delivery through innovative technology!

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. We appreciate all applications.

title: Marketing Operations Manager
description:
Marketing Operations Manager 



Type: Full-time, Remote

Working Hours: Singapore/Philippines Time

Reports to: Founder / COO





About Us



We are Singapore’s fastest growing performance marketing, education, and software company.



We help speakers, coaches, consultants, and service-based business owners:



- Fill paid events

- Scale marketing campaigns

- Build predictable lead systems

- Deliver strong client results through education, services, and software



Our business includes:



- Multiple live & virtual events every year

- Ongoing marketing campaigns across funnels

- A growing software + AI ecosystem with active clients



We move fast, run many parallel initiatives, and operate in a high-accountability environment.



We are now hiring a senior Operations Manager to act as the execution backbone of the company.



About the Role (Read Carefully)



This is not an assistant role.

This is not a coordination-only role.



As Operations Manager, you are the central execution owner of the business.



Your job is to:



- Translate priorities into execution

- Enforce deadlines

- Drive accountability

- Ensure events, marketing, and software operations run smoothly

- Reduce founder involvement in day-to-day execution



If something is delayed, unclear, or broken — you own fixing it.



Core Responsibilities

???? 1. Events Operations (Live & Virtual)



We run multiple paid events such as bootcamps, workshops, implementation sprints, and masterminds.



You own end-to-end operational execution of every event.



What This Includes:



- Planning & Timelines

- Build complete event execution plans in Asana

- Break events into phases: pre-event, marketing, event day, post-event

- Assign owners, set deadlines, and enforce follow-ups

- Ensure no assumptions, no missed dependencies



Marketing Coordination (Pre-Event)



- Coordinate copywriters, designers, video editors, tech team, and media buyers

- Ensure event funnels,
 sequences, WhatsApp reminders, and ad creatives are produced and launched on time

- Track registrations, attendance, and cost per lead (CPL)

- Flag performance issues early and work with the team to improve results



Tech & Systems



- Ensure registration flows, payment links, and automations work correctly

- Set up and test Zoom / webinar / streaming links (including backups)

- Ensure recordings, attendance tracking, and follow-up systems are ready

- Personally test critical flows before the event



Event-Day Execution



- Act as the behind-the-scenes execution lead

- Keep the event running on schedule

- Resolve tech, logistics, or team issues calmly and decisively

- Allow the founder to focus purely on delivery



Post-Event Follow-Up



- Ensure recordings and materials are delivered

- Coordinate feedback collection and internal debriefs

- Document improvements so each event runs better than the last



???? 2. Marketing Operations (Campaign Execution)



We run ongoing marketing campaigns across multiple funnels.



You do not need to write copy or run ads — but you own execution quality and timelines.



Responsibilities:



- Translate campaign plans into clear Asana tasks

- Delegate work to copywriters, designers, video editors, tech staff, and media buyers

- Ensure deliverables are completed on time and to standard



Track key metrics such as:



- Launch readiness

- Funnel performance

- Cost per lead (CPL)



Flag issues early and coordinate improvements with:



- Copy (messaging angles)

- Creatives (visual hooks)

- Media buyers (testing and optimisation)



Your role is to ensure campaigns run properly, not to execute them yourself.



???? 3. Software, Retention & Customer Success Operations



We operate software and AI tools used by paying clients.



You own customer success execution and operational quality.



Responsibilities:



- Ensure client queries are answered on time and professionally

- Coordinate tech, support, and success teams to resolve issues

- Oversee onboarding, retention, and activation workflows

- Track client engagement, satisfaction, and churn risks

- Coordinate projects to improve client results

- Support new feature and AI tool launches operationally



Ensure clients:



- Get results

- Stay engaged

- Trust the company

- Continue using and upgrading our products



This role requires thinking in systems, not just tickets.



???? 4. Accountability, Deadlines & Team Execution



- Own daily and weekly execution across teams

- Enforce deadlines using Asana

- Follow up relentlessly until work is completed and signed off

- Escalate issues early when standards are not met

- Ensure clarity of ownership on every task

- Eliminate bottlenecks and execution gaps



???? 5. Reporting & Leadership Visibility



- Provide concise daily and weekly ops updates

- Track execution status across events, marketing, and software

- Surface blockers, risks, and decisions required

- Reduce the need for leadership to chase updates



?? 6. Process & System Improvement



- Improve workflows, SOPs, and execution standards

- Identify inefficiencies and fix them

- Bring structure to fast-moving launches and initiatives

- Ensure systems scale as the company grows



Required Experience & Skills

Must-Have:



- Proven experience in operations, project management, or team leadership

- Background in agency, corporate, BPO, startup, or structured environments

- Strong experience using Asana or similar tools

- Comfortable setting, enforcing, and following up on deadlines

- Highly organised, detail-oriented, and execution-focused

- Able to work independently with minimal supervision

- Strong written and spoken English



Bonus:



- Experience with events, marketing campaigns, or funnels

- Experience in education, software, SaaS, or agency businesses

- Exposure to GoHighLevel / HighLevel or similar CRM platforms

- Experience supporting founders or senior leadership teams



This Role Is NOT For



? Entry-level or junior candidates

? Virtual assistants without ops ownership

? People uncomfortable enforcing deadlines

? Candidates who require constant instruction

? Those who prefer “support” over accountability



What Success Looks Like (First 90 Days)



- Events run smoothly with minimal founder involvement

- Marketing campaigns launch on time with fewer issues

- Clear operational visibility across all initiatives

- Fewer follow-ups required from leadership

- Strong execution discipline across the team



Growth & Culture



- Long-term role with growth opportunities

- High autonomy once execution reliability is proven

- Sponsored education and upskilling

- Yearly overseas team retreats

- Results-driven culture (no time tracking, KPI-based)



How to Apply



For an opportunity to be part of our team, please complete the application form:



???? 



Only applications submitted through the form will be considered.

title: High-Volume Recruitment Specialist (Logistics) - $500/month + $30 Commission Per Hire
description:
Job Description

About Oprisa GmbH: We are a rapidly expanding German company managing a massive fleet of couriers for major Food Delivery Platform across Germany (50+ of the biggest cities). We operate in a high-speed environment where headcount equals revenue.



Job Summary: We are seeking relentless "Hunters" for our Logistics Division. You will execute mass and aggressive hiring to fill 50+ driver seats per week. This is NOT a traditional corporate HR role; this is a high-pressure, high-reward numbers game.



Key Responsibilities:



Mass Recruitment: Execute end-to-end recruitment for courier/driver roles across Germany.



Guerilla Sourcing: Post and manage 50+ job advertisements per day on
 Groups, Marketplace, Kleinanzeigen, and other local boards.



Speed to Lead: Conduct fast screening calls (5-10 mins) and push candidates to "Signed Contract" status within 24 hours.



Pipeline Management: Maintain a pipeline of backup drivers to ensure zero vacancy.



Reporting: Track daily output (Ads Posted vs. Leads vs. Hires) and report directly to the Fleet HR Manager.



Required Qualifications:



Experience: Proven experience in Mass Hiring / RPO (Logistics, BPO, High-Volume Retail, or Blue-Collar staffing).



Grit: You are not afraid of rejection and can handle high targets.



Tech Savvy: Expert in navigating
 restrictions, VPNs, and managing multiple job board accounts simultaneously.



Language: Excellent written and spoken English. (German language skills are a huge plus).



???? THE OFFER (High Earning Potential):



Stable Base Salary: Paid on time, every time ($500 - $700 depending on experience - weekly payments).



???? COMMISSION BOOSTER: You receive $30 USD for EVERY driver you hire who completes 300 deliveries.



Example: If you hire 10 good drivers in a week and they hit the target -> That is an EXTRA $300 USD/week for you.



There is NO CAP on commissions. The more quality drivers you find, the more you earn.



Schedule:



Must be willing to work mid-shift / night-shift (Philippine Time) to overlap with German business hours (Afternoon/Evening in Germany).



HOW TO APPLY: Please apply directly through this platform. Note: We use AI to screen applicants. To ensure your application is seen, please include the word "HUNTER" in your subject line or introduction and briefly state how many people you hired in your best month.



Skills Required:

Recruitment

HR Management

English (Speaking & Writing)

German optional, but big plus (Speaking & Writing)

Social Media Marketing 
)

Lead Generation

Telemarketing
