title: Amazon Fee & Unit Economics Management Accountant
description:
Urgent Hiring: Amazon Fee & Unit Economics Management Accountant

Reports To: CEO

Work Hours: Philippines daytime work hours



ONLY APPLICANTS WHO WILL APPLY THROUGH THE LINK WILL BE ENTERTAINED.



Company Vision:

We want to work with you to grow our company while helping you to become a superstar in your field. We value problem solvers, go getters, people with opinions who want to make an impact. You will be on the leading edge of Amazon and online strategies and will be continually improving your knowledge in the pursuit of helping us grow our business.

At the same time, you will be working with a company that values community & family in both our internal and customer facing sides. Our mission is to delight kids & parents with creative craft kits and related products. We are 100% focused on that mission and want you to be there on the ride with us!

That’s where you come in as our next Amazon Fee & Unit Economics Management Accountant



Role Purpose

Own, track, and optimize every cost that impacts Amazon unit economics, so leadership always has a clear, accurate, and optimized view of true ASIN-level profitability.



What Success Looks Like:

Success in this role means true Amazon profitability is no longer a guessing game. Every ASIN has a fully loaded cost that includes product cost, shipping, duties, Amazon fees, affiliate commissions, and ranking-related marketing spend. Leadership can confidently d
 which products to scale, reprice, suppress, liquidate, or discontinue based on real data — not blended averages or assumptions.



A top performer in this role consistently reduces total Amazon unit costs while improving cost visibility. Through tight auditing, proactive fee recovery, smarter shipping and duty tracking, and disciplined attribution of affiliate and ranking spend, this role directly increases contribution margin without increasing ad spend or revenue risk.



Primary Objectives

• Amazon Fee, Shipping & Cost Auditing

Own end-to-end auditing of all Amazon, logistics, and ranking-related costs.

• Fully Loaded ASIN-Level Unit Economics

Maintain accurate per-unit costs including shipping, duties, fees, affiliates, and marketing.

• Cost Optimization & Reduction

Identify and implement cost-saving opportunities across fees, logistics, and promotional spend.

• Profitability & Decision Support

Provide leadership with clean, reliable Amazon cost and margin reporting.



Regular Work Activities

• Audit all Amazon FBA fees (pick/pack, weight, storage, returns)

• Track short-term and long-term storage fees by ASIN

• Monitor aged inventory fees and cost exposure

• Track AWD inbound, storage, and handling fees

• Reconcile inbound placement fees

• Track removal, disposal, and liquidation costs

• Track international shipping costs (factory ? port ? Amazon)

• Allocate shipping cost per unit by shipment and ASIN

• Track duties, tariffs, customs, and brokerage fees

• Maintain landed cost per unit calculations

• Track affiliate commissions tied to Amazon sales

• Attribute affiliate spend at ASIN or product-group level

• Track ranking, launch, and promotional marketing costs

• Identify unprofitable or fee-heavy SKUs

• Submit and track Amazon reimbursement claims

• Create monthly Amazon cost & margin reports

• Monitor fee and cost trend anomalies

• Maintain SOPs for Amazon cost tracking and audits



Key Skills Required

• Understanding & ability to learn Amazon FBA fee structures

• Strong grasp of landed cost accounting

• Advanced spreadsheet skills

• Experience with SKU-level profitability modeling

• Strong analytical and investigative mindset

• High attention to detail

• Ability to reconcile complex datasets

• Process-driven

• Cost-reduction oriented thinking

• Clear written & verbal communication



People Contacts and Interactions – What are the primary people contacts in this job (who, why, and how often)?

• Direct report to the CEO

• Frequent communication with

• Operations Team

• Logistics Team



Role Requirements

Experience, Training, and Education

• 2+ years working with Amazon Seller Central data

• Experience tracking shipping, duties, and landed costs

• Familiarity with FBA, AWD, and storage fee structures

• Advanced spreadsheet proficiency required

• E-commerce or marketplace finance experience preferred

• Experience submitting Amazon reimbursement claims preferred

• Comfortable owning ASIN-level economics end-to-end

• Strong personal accountability

• Not responsible for tax, payroll, AR/AP, or general bookkeeping

title: Senior Photo Tech & VR Specialist (The Finisher)
description:
Salary: PHP 60,000 – 70,000 / month + Bonuses (after 3 months)



Fixed day-shift Schedule: 10:00 AM – 7:00 PM PHT. Enjoy a perfect work-life balance while working for a premium US-based agency.



About us: We are building a specialized, elite team where everyone is treated as a partner, not just a number. We pay 2x to 3x above market rates because we expect 2x to 3x the attention to detail. We value your growth, your family time (no graveyard shifts), and we offer a long-term home for the best talent in the Philippines.



Role Overview:

You are the technical backbone. You take AI output and make it 100% photorealistic. You ensure that "luxury" is felt in every pixel through expert retouching and immersive virtual tours.



Core Responsibilities:

• Technical Retouching: Expert window pulls, twilight conversions, and manual shadow painting in Photoshop.

• Asset & Preset Library: You will build our Internal Asset Library, including custom Lightroom/Photoshop presets, high-res sky replacements, and fireplace overlays.

• VR & Floor Plans: Build interactive 3DVista/Kuula tours and process CubiCasa floor plans.



Technical & Infrastructure Requirements:

• Master-level Photoshop skills (Generative Fill, Masking, Camera Raw).

• Mastery of Topaz Photo AI for professional upscaling.

• Experience with VR software (Kuula or 3DVista preferred) and HDR editing.



General Terms & Elite Benefits 

• 13th Month Pay: Accrued monthly, paid annually.

• Fixed Schedule: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM PHT. No graveyard shifts.

• Strict No-Leave Policy: During the first 3 months of training, SOP development, and asset building, no leaves (planned or unplanned) are permitted to ensure full immersion.



Bonus Structure:

• Months 1-3 (Probation): Base Salary + Training. No personal bonuses during this phase.

• Month 4+: Eligibility for Monthly Personal Performance Bonuses (based on Scorecard).

• Quarterly: Eligibility for Team Revenue Bonuses (Starts after first full quarter).

• Infrastructure Bonus: We pay for elite talent; in return, we expect you to invest in your own redundant power and internet setups to guarantee 100?livery.



Career Growth & Future Opportunities:

We are not just looking for executors; we are looking for future leaders. As we scale, we offer clear pathways for both horizontal and vertical growth:

Vertical Growth: High-performers will be prioritized for future Team Lead and Department Head positions as we expand our production cells.

Horizontal Growth: We value personal development. We provide opportunities to broaden your skill set across different AI tools, creative directions, or operational management, ensuring you remain at the forefront of the industry.

Long-term Partnership: We invest in your evolution. If you help us build the systems today, you will lead the teams of tomorrow.



?? HOW TO APPLY (Read Carefully)

Because we are a "Detail-Oriented" agency, we auto-reject all copy-paste and bot applications. To be considered, you must follow these instructions exactly:

1. Subject Line: Change your subject line to: [Job Title] Expert - [Your Favorite Interior Design Style] - [Your Name]

(Example: Senior AI Artist - Modern Organic - Maria Santos)

2. The First Sentence: Start your cover letter with exactly this phrase: "I have 100% redundant power and internet, ready for the 10-7 PHT shift."

3. Include the Following:

• A link to your specific Luxury Portfolio (Google Drive, Behance, or Website).

• A screenshot of your PC Specs (RAM, GPU, CPU) and a Speedtest result.

4. The Secret Question: In your message, tell me: "What is the most important thing to get right when doing a Twilight Conversion to make it look expensive?"

If you do not follow these 4 steps, your application will be ignored immediately.

title: Community & Growth Associate
description:
About Catenary Home



Catenary Home is a design-forward pet furniture brand creating pieces that belong in well-designed homes, not pet aisles. We believe living with pets shouldn’t mean compromising on aesthetics, materials, or intention.



We operate at the intersection of design, community, and culture, across DTC, wholesale, and international markets. We’re a small, growing team that cares deeply about details, how things look, how they work, and how they’re experienced by real people.



If you notice design, care about tone, and want to be close to how a brand is actually built, you’ll feel at home here.





The Role



The Community & Growth Associate is a trusted, execution-focused role supporting Catenary’s customer experience, operations, and growth.



You’ll own customer-facing communication, keep systems and workflows running smoothly, and help turn ideas into execution across multiple channels. This role is ideal for someone who wants close proximity to how a modern brand is built with hands-on exposure, real ownership, and the opportunity to grow by doing.





Key Responsibilities:



Community Communication & Management

Own DTC community-facing communication across
, social DMs, comments, and reviews, responding with clarity, warmth, and sound judgment, while supporting communication with press, affiliate creators, and B2B partners as needed, and knowing when to resolve independently or escalate.



Customer Service Workflow Management

Manage end-to-end customer service processes including returns, exchanges, refunds, gift cards, and discount codes with accuracy and follow-through.



Systems & Platform Maintenance

Support operational and brand hygiene by keeping internal and external platforms accurate and up to date, including order processing, inventory support, light content reposting, and product data/imagery updates.



 Marketing & Campaign Support

Support
 marketing initiatives for B2B and D2C channels through customer segmentation, copy drafting, and campaign preparation, helping translate ideas into ready-to-review executions.



Website & SEO Execution Support

Draft blog content and implement SEO and UX-related updates across the site based on provided direction, supporting ongoing search performance and site quality.





Qualities We’re Looking For:

-Must have prior experience working night shifts and be comfortable maintaining productivity and communication during overnight hours.



-Strong interpersonal judgment and fluency in the nuances of tone, language, and context across customers, wholesale partners, press, and creators.



-Clear, confident written communication with strong intuition for brand voice and how messages will land with different audiences.



-Curious and growth-minded, excited to learn by doing and build skills through hands-on exposure and real responsibility.



-Strong executional ownership and follow-through, detail-oriented, reliable, and comfortable closing loops without constant oversight.



-Finds fulfillment in ownership, learning, and making meaningful impact within a fast-moving, entrepreneurial environment.



-Experience working across tools and systems is a plus (e.g., Google Workspace, Shopify, CRM, WMS, EDI), or the ability to learn new systems quickly.





Other Information:

-This is a full-time Independent Contractor position.



-This role does not include benefits, including Philippine government–mandated or health benefits; contractors are responsible for their own taxes and withholdings.



-Working hours: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM (CST).



-Compensation is competitive and based on skills, experience, and qualifications.

title: QA Test Engineer – Automation & Development
description:

We are currently looking for an experienced QA Automation Engineer with strong automation and manual testing expertise to join our growing team and help ensure the quality of our products across multiple platforms.

title: Senior Frontend Developer - Ultra Labs
description:
Company Overview

Ultra Labs is a U.S.-based business incubator/accelerator that focuses on software/tech-based businesses. We are currently seeking a talented Senior Frontend Engineer to join our team and contribute to the development of cutting-edge solutions across multiple complex business applications.



As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you’ll work on sophisticated enterprise applications including MSP management platforms, educational technology systems, and multi-tenant SaaS applications. This role requires both deep technical expertise and the ability to understand complex business domains.



Development Environment Requirements

Platform Preference (Important)

_Preferred: macOS or Linux developers

_Acceptable: Windows developers with demonstrated WSL2 proficiency

_We operate a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) contractor model. Our team is primarily Mac/Linux-based, and our development workflows are optimized for Unix-like environments.



Required technical comfort:

_SSH configuration and key management (~/.ssh/config)

_SSH tunneling for secure development and database access

_Advanced Git workflows (rebasing, cherry-picking, complex merge strategies)

_Command-line proficiency and shell scripting

_Environment management across multiple projects



For Windows developers specifically:

_Active WSL2 usage (not just installed) with Ubuntu or similar

_Comfortable working between Windows and Linux environments

_Experience with cross-platform development challenges

_Ability to troubleshoot environment-specific issues independently



Technical Stack Overview

Primary Technologies

_React 17/18 with TypeScript and modern hooks patterns

_Redux Toolkit & RTK Query for state management and API integration

_Ant Design with Styled Components for UI development

_AWS Amplify for authentication and cloud services

_Complex build systems (CRACO, Webpack customization)



Integration Requirements

_AWS Services: Cognito, S3, CloudFront

_Payment Processing: Stripe integration

_Maps & Location: Google Maps API

_Third-party APIs: Various business service integrations

_Database connectivity: Multiple backend systems



Project Complexity Examples

_MSP Platform: 1,168+ TypeScript files, complex business workflows

_Educational Platform: Multi-application monorepo architecture

_Enterprise Features: Role-based access, multi-tenant architecture



Core Responsibilities

Frontend Architecture & Development

_Design and implement scalable React applications with TypeScript

_Build and maintain complex Redux state management systems

_Develop responsive, accessible user interfaces using Ant Design

_Optimize application performance for large datasets and real-time updates

_Collaborate with UX/UI designers to implement pixel-perfect, user-friendly interfaces



Integration & API Development

_Work closely with backend developers on Java and Python FastAPI applications

_Integrate frontend components with server-side logic across multiple tech stacks

_Implement secure authentication flows with AWS Cognito

_Build robust error handling and loading states for API interactions



Business Domain Implementation

_Translate complex business requirements into intuitive user interfaces

_Understand and implement domain-specific workflows (MSP, educational management)

_Build sophisticated forms, tables, and data visualization components

_Ensure cross-browser compatibility and optimize for various devices



Code Quality & Collaboration

_Participate in code reviews and maintain high coding standards

_Write comprehensive unit and integration tests

_Document complex components and architectural decisions

_Mentor junior developers on React best practices and business domain knowledge



Required Qualifications

Core Technical Skills

_5+ years of React development experience with hooks, context, and advanced patterns

_Strong TypeScript proficiency - complex type definitions, generics, utility types

_Redux Toolkit expertise - RTK Query, async thunks, normalized state patterns

_Advanced JavaScript/ES6+ - modern language features and best practices

_CSS/Styling mastery - Styled Components, responsive design, CSS-in-JS



Essential Experience

_3+ years with complex business applications - B2B SaaS, enterprise software

_Component library development - reusable, composable architecture

_State management at scale - large applications, performance optimization

_API integration experience - RESTful APIs, error handling, caching

_Testing frameworks - Jest, React Testing Library, unit/integration testing



Development Environment

_Excellent spoken and written English

_Advanced Git proficiency - complex workflows, conflict resolution

_Build tools experience - Webpack, npm/yarn, modern toolchains

_Unix/Linux command line comfort (or WSL2 for Windows users)

_SSH and network configuration - tunnels, key management, config files



Collaboration & Process

_Agile/Scru
thodology experience

_Strong problem-solving skills and debugging abilities

_Excellent time management and ability to meet deadlines consistently

_Fast-paced environment adaptability

_Open to feedback and continuous learning mindset



Strongly Preferred (Polyglot Mindset)

Multi-Language Experience

We highly value polyglot programmers who demonstrate depth across multiple technologies:

_Backend awareness: Understanding of Java Spring Boot or Python FastAPI

_Scripting capabilities: Python for automation, data processing, or tooling

_Full-stack thinking: Ability to work across the entire application stack

_Technology adaptability: Track record of learning new languages/frameworks



Evidence we look for:

_GitHub/portfolio showing multiple programming languages

_Understanding of language-appropriate design patterns

_Ability to choose the right tool for each task

_Experience bridging frontend/backend communication effectively



Advanced Technical Preferences

_AWS ecosystem experience - Amplify, S3, Lambda, infrastructure knowledge

_Performance optimization - bundle analysis, runtime performance, memory management

_Accessibility expertise - WCAG compliance, screen reader support

_Testing strategy - E2E testing (Cypress), visual regression testing

_DevOps awareness - CI/CD pipelines, deployment strategies



Domain Experience (Nice-to-Have)

_MSP/Service Desk knowledge - ticketing systems, time tracking, invoicing workflows

_Educational technology - registration systems, workshop management

_Multi-tenant architecture - organization-specific customization, role-based access

_Payment processing - Stripe integration, subscription management



Experience Level: Senior (5-7+ years)

_This role requires senior-level expertise due to:

What Makes This Role Unique

Growth Opportunities:

title: Marketing Manager
description:
Ultra Labs is searching for a proactive, highly organized Marketing Manager to support and strengthen our marketing operations across multiple projects and brands. Ultra Labs is a U.S.–based Business Incubator/Accelerator focused on software and tech-driven businesses.



The Marketing Manager will take ownership of marketing processes, ensure smooth execution across campaigns, and support data-driven decision making. The ideal candidate is independent, detail-oriented, and highly accountable, with experience building simple automation workflows, managing marketing tools, and keeping projects moving forward.





What You’ll Do

_Manage and coordinate multiple marketing projects, campaigns, and initiatives.

_Maintain accurate data, documentation, and reporting across marketing tools.

_Use AI tools to support marketing productivity, content tasks, and workflow automation.

_Set up basic marketing automation, tracking, and performance dashboards.

_Monitor campaign results and highlight insights, trends, and improvement opportunities.

_Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to ensure projects move forward on schedule.

_Support lead management processes, campaign tracking, and simple attribution reporting.

_Maintain clear, professional communication with tea
mbers, partners, and customers.





What We’re Looking For

_Highly organized, detail-oriented, and strong at managing multiple priorities.

_Persistent and proactive—you follow up, get answers, and keep projects moving.

_A self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced, accountable environment.

_Experience with marketing tools (HubSpot, GA, or similar) and comfortable learning new platforms.

_Ability to set up simple automation workflows, tracking links, and dashboards.

_Strong analytical mindset—you like clean data and clear reporting.

_Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

_3-5 years of experience in marketing coordination, marketing operations, or a related role (preferred).



If you’re organized, resourceful, and excited to own marketing execution and operations across multiple projects, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Full Stack Developer

Experience Level: Mid–Senior (3–5 years)



Company Overview

Ultra Labs is a U.S.-based business incubator/accelerator that focuses on software/tech-based businesses. We are currently seeking a talented Senior Frontend Engineer to join our team and contribute to the development of cutting-edge solutions across multiple complex business applications.



We are looking for a Full Stack Developer with strong frontend foundations and solid backend experience who can contribute across the stack in complex business applications.



What You’ll Do

_Implement and maintain frontend features using modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks.

_Build backend services and APIs that power product logic, integrations, and data processing.

_Integrate with third-party services (e.g., authentication, payments, maps).

_Participate in API design and ensure seamless communication between frontend and backend.

_Write clean, maintainable code with good testing practices.

_Collaborate remotely with engineers and stakeholders across time zones.



Tech Stack (Required)

Frontend

_JavaScript/TypeScript

_React (17/18) with modern patterns/hooks

_State management (Redux Toolkit / RTK Query)

_UI frameworks/libraries (Ant Design / Styled Components)

_Responsive, accessible UI development



Backend

_REST API implementation

_Database experience (PostgreSQL or similar)

_Server-side language experience (e.g., Java or equivalent)



General

_Git version control

_Unix/Linux command line comfort (or WSL2)

_Experience working with APIs and cloud integrations



Nice-to-Have

_Python (FastAPI preferred)

_AWS or CI/CD experience

_Experience with authentication services (e.g., AWS Cognito)

_Payment system integrations (e.g., Stripe)

_Familiarity with additional backend languages (Node.js/Express, etc.)



Required Skills

_3–5 years of full stack software development experience

_Strong problem-solving and communication skills

_Comfortable building both frontend UIs and backend services in a distributed team
